145b5: blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa la gzugs su snang ba ci 'dra ba nye bar gzhag pa/ de 'dra ba nyid kyi gzugs brnyan de na lhag chad med par mtshungs par snang yang / me long gi
145b6: dkyil 'khor ni mi sems mi rtog go/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang mi dgongs ma rtog par/ lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa
145b7: tshim par mdzad de/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin/ khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin
145b8: skye mched kyis rab tu bye ba ma yin/ las las byung ba ma yin/ nyon mongs pa las byung ba ma yin/ pha ma las byung ba ma yin/ 'byung ba chen po'i nur nur po las byung ba ma yin

146a1: sha dang khrag gis g.yogs pa ma yin/ rus pa dang chu ba'i bog res sbrel pa ma yin/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang / srog dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste/ chos
146a2: kyi sku dang gzugs dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sku dang / spros pa med cing rgyu ba med pa'i sku yin yang de gzugs dang mtshan gtso bor byed pa'i sems can/ sku bstan pas 'dul ba rnams kyi mig la snang bar 'gyur ro// gzugs
146a3: las dben pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid gtso bor byed pa'i sems can rnams la ni/ lha'i mig gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bltar snang bar mi 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de la 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa'i sems can
146a4: byinang nas kyang / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong / kha cig gis ni mi mthong / kha cig gis ni rgyad ring po na 'dug kyang mthong / kha cig gis ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong / kha cig gis ni thag ring po na 'dug kyang mi
146a5: mthong / kha cig gis ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong ngo // la las ni dran pa'i rnam pas mthong la/ g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni g.yeng ba'i rnam pas mthong la/ dran pa'i rnam pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni
146a6: gzhan gyis nye bar bstan pas mthong zhing / bdag gis bltas pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni bdag gis bltas pas mthong la/ gzhan gyi bstan pas mi mthong ngo // la las ni rmi lam na mthong las dpan mi mjed la las ni
146a7: sad pa na mthong la/ thi la man mi mthong ngo // la las ni mnyam par bzhag na mthong la/ langs nam mthong ngo // la las ni langs na mthong la/ mnyam par bzhag na mi mthong ngo // pha las ni sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la/
146a8: mi sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no// la las ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la/ sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no// la las ni ma bstsal bas mi mthong la/ bstsal bas mthong ngo //

146b1: lalas nem bsngal bas mthong la/ bstsal bas ma mthong ngo // la las ni bsgrims na mthang la/ ma bsgrim nam yin na// la las nim bsnams na mthang la/ bsnams na ma yin na/ na pa'i blo bram dmar
146b2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'di dag dang gzhan yang tshad med pa'i rnam par ston pa mdzad do/ / gang yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lta bu lus dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ mnyam par bzhag pa// lus zhi ba
146b3: dul ba de dag gi mig kyang 'khrul bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul dpag par bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma bzung bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni kha dog
146b4: tha dad pas tshad med pa'o/ / chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// zhi ba'i blo gros nam mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab po// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/
146b5: dper na/ nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni spros pa med pal
146b6: zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang spros pa mi mnga' ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin
146b7: gshegs pa'i sku yang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs
146b8: pa'i sku yang 'gyur ba mi mda' zhing / rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni gzugs su rnang ba thams cad zhugs pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang

147a1: sems can du byang thathams cad byags dang/ / na rnas rdzas 'a u0f7f/ da na/ namamapa'i dang nga na gzugs su snang bathams cad 'dus sa// napa'i thos kyis dpashin du ban gaganas padu da/
147a2: du yang mams can du snang ba thams cad 'dus so// zhi ba'i zas 'dis ste/ dab na/ rnams pa zhin dang / gal pa dang / sman dang / nags pa lathams cad rnam par bal ga// na ba ga pa kyi
147a3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra las kyang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par 'phel lo// de ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dbar na// nam pa'a' ni rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin te/ cing
147a4: brjod pa yin no/ / ni ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang / rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa sang ma yin te/ cir yang brjod pa ma yin no// zhi ba'i blogs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
147a5: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams na stug tsug bltar ma mthong bste/ zhi ba'i bri thos gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyeg cugs meng par nus pa de na/ kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang bdud dang bcas pa dang / mkha pa
147a6: pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / me dang / lAm yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// ma mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bas 'di ltar mngon par shes te/ bcom
147a7: ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas grong khyer sa masan/ drang srong ltung ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig na/ shar phyogs logs
147a8: kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsam bka'i mdog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams dgra 'dul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chad zhes bya ba de/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang / mchod

147b1: dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba 'byor 'dzag rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir 'angs te/ das bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ga thos phyag la lanas/ lan gsum brko ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smra
147b2: sngar 'dug go/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams na spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong la/ sku tshad med cing mtha' yas kyang / dag/
147b3: gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshed dang / mtha' yongs su btsal bar bya'o// snyam mo de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis/ rang gi lus dpag cad brgyad khri bani stong du byin gyis brlabs
147b4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bltas nas/ / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad par mthong nas des 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul
147b5: kyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba yin gyis/ bdag gis de bas kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'tshe btsal bar bya'o snyam nas de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pas/ steng gi phyogs legs
147b6: su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs shing
147b7: 'chol bzhes te/ chos kyang ston pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang byin nas/ de 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar ma nus shod/ de bzhin gshegs
147b8: ba'i sku'i tshad dam/ mtha' yang mi dmigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ pad ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po gal ba der song ste/ byin nas

148a1: bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ des bcom ldan 'das de
148a2: la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji srid gcig nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang ga'i klung bye ba phrag rgya'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa nas
148a3: khyed 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ring mo zhig nas/ mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
148a4: pa de'i dbu'i gtsug mthong bar yang rngo ma thog la/ sku'i tshad dam/ mtha' rtogs par yang rngo ma thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gal te shugs 'di nyid
148a5: dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa 'di nyid kyis gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par/ steng gi phyogs logs su song du zin kyang / bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu/
148a6: gang yang dpe gzhag pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dper bya ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sku dang gsung dang / thugs dang /
148a7: gzugs dang / mtshan gyi dper bya ba'i/ dbong dgod pa de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa'o// dpa' gcig ni ma gtogs te/ 'di ltar dpe nam mkha'o// nam mkha'
148a8: ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyang de tsam mo/ / ting nge 'dzin kyang de tsam mo// shes rab kyang de tsam mo// rnam par grol ba yang de tsam mo// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba mang de tsam mo//

148b1: sku yang de tsam mo// gsung yang de tsam mo/ thugs kyang de tsam mo// gzugs kyang de tsam mo// mtshan kyang de tsam mo/ de bas na nam mkha' tshad med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bstan to//
148b2: zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ tshem zhing mgul yi rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/
148b3: bcom ldan 'das de'i thabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi
148b4: stobs kyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
148b5: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra ba yi/
148b6: sangs rgyas chos la mi gang zhig/ pha rol tu ni mchi 'tshal ba// de ni nyam thag 'gyur ba lags// sangs rgyas sku ni blta slad du// gang gA bye ba phrag brgya yi// bye ma ji snyed de snyed kyi// zhing rnams su ni bdag mchis/
148b7: so// de snyed zhing du mchis nas ni// pad ma can gyi zhing du mchis// 'on kyang khyod kyi dbu gtsug dang // su yi tshad kyang ma mthong lags// zhing den ni 'dren bzhugs pa// mtshan ni dpal gyi snying po lags// de yis bdag gi
148b8: bsam mkhyen nas/ / 'di skad du ni bka' stsal to// la la sangs rgyas chos rnams la// dpe dgod ji snyed byed pa ni// de dag sangs rgyas mi 'tsham ste// de dag rgyal bskur ba 'debs// 'a

149a1: la dpe gcig yang dag ste/ / nam mkha'i khams su bstan pa lags// de ni sangs rgyas chos dang 'thun// gang na'ang de yi tshad ma mchis// nam mkha' 'di niji tsam par// sang rgyas kyini rnam
149a2: khrims dang / / ting nge 'dzin dang rnam grol dang // rnam grol ye shes mthong de tsam// nam mkha'i tshad na ji tsam pa// sangs rgyas gzugs kyang de tsam ste// 'jig rten mgon po'i dbu gtsug kyang // nam mkha'
149a3: khams dang mtshungs pa lags/ / nam mkhas ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ skus kyang de snyed khyab pa lags// sgra yis ji snyed khyab gyur pa// 'od kyis kyang ni ji snyed byab// 'od kyis ji skad khyab gyur pa/ gsung gis
149a4: kyang ni de snyed khyab/ / gsung gis ji snyed khyab gyur pa/ thugs kyis kyang ni de snyed khyab// thugs kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa// byams pas kyang ni de snyed khyab// byams pas ji snyed khyab gyur pa/
149a5: ye shes kyis ni de snyed khyab// ye shes ji snyed khyab gyur pa// sku yis kyang ni de snyed khyab// gang gis byang chub blo skyed pa// de snyed bsod nams khyab par bgyid// byang chub sems kyi bsod nams
149a6: gang / / de la gal te gzugs mchis na/ nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/ de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur// sems can kun gyi bsod nams kyi// phung po ji snyed yongs bzung ba// de snyed byang
149a7: chub sems dpa' yi/ / byang chub sems las rab tu 'byung // byang chub sems kyi bsod nams kyi// phung po ji snyed brjod pa bas// dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin na/ de bas bsod nams ches mang ngo //
149a8: dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis nan tan du// bskal pa bye bar brjod mdzad kyang // mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur ma lags// dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa dang / byang chub

149b1: sangs byab da dmas/ / / ra banyid phams pas// brdzun masang mar 'grus// 'du tud la 'dang masanas// thang chubs kyang ngag dang / dmangaca ldan la da bang ga/ don papa nga/
149b2: sdang ba la// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// chos kyi rtog pa 'di thos nas/ de yis byang chub spyad spyod cing // sangs rgyas yon tan 'thob par 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa na// zhing
149b3: rnams bye ba rab tu g.yos/ / lha ni bye ba phrag stong gis// rol mo'i sol snyan bye bablangs// sangs rgyas gyon che ba nyid// shugs 'chang gis ni bshad thos nas// srog chags bye ba phrag stong dag/ byang
149b4: rmutu ni sems bskyed do/ / sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa po// rang byung rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas// gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dpag yas bla na ma mchis lags// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de
149b5: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o/ / / bam po bzhi pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de na/ sems can du ma 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa dag las kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs par
149b6: sku mthong ngo / / kha cig gis ni ma mthong ngo // de la gang dag gis mthong ba de dag ni dga' bskyed nas lta'o// gang dag gis ma mthong ba de dag ni cang mi smra bar gyur cing sdod do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs
149b7: ni/ zhal zas mi gsol mod kyi// sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas gsol bar mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub kyir ma gro pa'i lha gzi brjid kyi stobs shes bya ba dag/ rtag tu
149b8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring du 'brang zhing de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du zer na/ sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas kham tshang du blangs te gsol par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs

150a1: bas lam cad du blangs pa yang blad dad na 'dug da nga dag gis rtse nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul pa'i sems can sngon dge ba'i rnab bskyed palas kyi skye ba pa'i ba gis sdes nas nga/
150a2: dang de dag tu bangs pa/ bza ba dang / btung ba dang / zab mi da pa dang / bkris pas nam chu dbang gyur ba/ ji snyed pa dge la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshas kyi bamepa pas dben nas// sems can de dag/
150a3: gis kyang zas de thos pa dang / bkres sgom dang bral ba de zhi lus che mnas/ bsam bathag pa nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gang dag log par byung ba ni
150a4: dgasas ma/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nanas pa/ byang chub tu sems de bskyed par mi nus pa de dag la yang de ni dmya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// ni ba'i blo thos rnamagrangs 'dis na sa rtsod kyi
150a5: thaM da bzhin/ / shegs pa rnas pasamigs ning / de bzhin gshegs pa/ tshwas byin la na stan du snang gapar byaste/ de thams de pazhin gshegs pa'i blan srid med kyi bus mthogs pa/
150a6: mi shigs pa/ dets+tshe bzhinan/ nipa'i thams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra na/ bab nga yod ga med do/ nagagasam gapa/ mchi ma u0f7f/ rludang sA sa sam/
150a7: ngan sngags pa pa/ migatsang ba med kyi zhi nga'i ma thos bzhin gshegs pa'i blan 'dzam bu'i chuba'i gser gyi ga dbun bu ste/ bang snong ma yin pa/ grag med pa/ nam tho ba med pa'o// ni ba'i blo thos
150a8: 'di gyi bya rdo rje dang / 'dra yang / 'ja ma byad gsal dgasar reg na bde bar 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i che banyid pa ltos/ ni bi'i blo thos gang gi tshig zi brjid cheg/ ga'i brji

150b1: rgya zu dang / ma ma pa ga nag shegs ga ban/ rnams pa ga pa zhus/ blan ma pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa byung chub rdzamamapa brgyad de/ dedag rnam
150b2: paskyed par mi 'gyur ba'i dus de dang tshod de yod do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu
150b3: bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so/ / zhe sdang la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag byams pa thob bo// gtig mug la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag ye shes kyi snang
150b4: 'thob po/ / cha mnyam pa la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag nyon mongs pa dang bral bar shes so// ser sna can gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag gtong ba la mos par 'gyur ro// tshul
150b5: khrims 'chal ba gang dag gis mthong na de dag tshul khrims la mos par 'gyur ro/ / gnod sems can gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag bzod pa thob bo// lo lo can gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag brtson 'grus la
150b6: mos par 'gyur ro/ / sems g.yengs pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// shes rab 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na/ de dag shes rab la mos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mdor na sems can
150b7: dkar po'i chos gang dang gang dag dang bral ba dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad rgyun chad nas/ dge ba'i sems las
150b8: gnas par 'gyur te/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o// 'i ba'i blogs de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de yang lhun gyis grub

151a1: cir bsgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sprul to// sbrul lo// sprul par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang
151a2: sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed par 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul
151a3: ba de snyed du bzhud de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don tu sku las 'od kha dog dum
151a4: kha deg tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong pa dag phyung ste/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byed pa de yang / lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' ba dang / mngon
151a5: par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de/ zhi blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra'i gsas dang / ldan pa / 'i phrin pas yongasu dag pa la 'jug pa rang zad tsam zhig bstan du zad kyi/ bskal/
151a6: pa'am/ de bas lhag par brjod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las yongasu dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i mthar phyin par ma nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi bya ba brtan pa
151a7: 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// thams cad dang
151a8: ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la/ lha dang mi'i me tog rnams kyi sa mngon par gton to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can

151b1: ste/ gsang bapa'i bdag pa gan rdzan rgyabs ga nas/ gas papa' bdag pa la gan rje kyad byas da na gagags pa gas bad pa'ang lags par smras pa/ lags sa/
151b2: legs so// de bzhin gshegs pas kya na zhing rjes su dgyes so// legs so zhes bya ba ba to// / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
151b3: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsung gi gsang ba dang / gsung
151b4: ga 'phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang gis nub mo// de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo len
151b5: pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so/ / gsung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs
151b6: pan rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ de bzhin/ shegs pa dgas/ byu ba'am dzub pa mi mnga'o// rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par mi dpyod do// rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa med pan/ dag mi 'byung ste
151b7: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang rnam par mi rtog/ rnam par mi dpyod de/ rtog par mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog par mi mdzad/ mi gsung / mi rjod/ gsung bar mi mdzad kyang / sems can rnams 'di snyam
151b8: du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung ngo snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ yi ga'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig par mi mdzad kyang // sems can yi ge

152a1: lhur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag la chos ston to// bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos brtan kun shes so snyam mo// de la yang de bzhin gshe
152a2: ba ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms su mdzad do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i choms dang spros dang / zhal gyi dargan dang / ljags dang / zhal gyi sgo nas sgra byung ba yang med la/ 'byung ba /
152a3: dag go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgra byung ba de ni/ nam mkha' las 'byung na/ sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo // snyam
152a4: so/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni/ rnam pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ste/ rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyen pa'i gsung 'byung ba dang / 'jam pa dang / yid du
152a5: 'ong ba dang / yid du 'thad pa dang / dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / snyan cing 'jobs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / snyan pa dang / dul ba dang /
152a6: mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlangs pa dang / rab tu dul ba dang / rnar snyan pa dang / lus sim par byed pa dang / sems tshim par byed pa dang / snying dga' bar byed pa dang / dga' ba de skyed pa dang
152a7: yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / kun tu shes par bya ba dang / rnam par rig bya ba dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang / kun shes par byed pa dang /
152a8: dab par rig par byed pa dang / rigs pa dang / 'brel ba dang / zlos pa skyon med pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs can dang / glang po che'i sgra skad dang / 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang / klu'i dbang ba'i sgra dang /

152b1: dri za'i glu dbyangs dang / bya ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa dang / shang shang te'u yi sgra dbyangs su grags pa dang / lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa dang / dza'i sgra dang / ma khengs pa dang /
152b2: mi dma' ba dang / sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / tshig zur chag pa med pa dang / ma tshang ba med pa dang / ma zhum pa dang / mi zhan pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / khyab pa dang / chub pa dang / rgyun chags pa dang /
152b3: 'brel ba dang / sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / ma smad pa dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / ma rtags pa dang / 'khor kun tu grags pa dang / 'dod chags zhi bar
152b4: byed pa dang / zhe sdang 'dul ba dang / gti mug sel ba dang / bdud tshar bcod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'byung ba ste// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag
152b5: drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'byung ngo / / zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tham cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / sems can thams cad kyi
152b6: bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang / zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du nga mdo'i sde 'am/ dbyangs kyis bskyed pa'i sde 'am/ lung du bsnun pa'i sde 'am/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde
152b7: 'am/ ched du brjod pa'i sde 'am/ gling bzhi'i sde 'am/ de lta bu byung ba'i sde 'am skyes pa'i rabs kyis sde 'am/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde 'am/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde 'am/ btan la bab par bstan
152b8: pa'i sde 'am/ dpe 'am/ sngon gyi tshul lam/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde 'am/ kun tu bsnyad pa 'di ston tozhe'am/ rab tu gsal bar mdzad do zhe 'am/ rab tu shes par mdzad do zhe 'am/

153a1: ga na la/ su / rdzum+b+ha / mya ya pa nas/

153a8: drab shad kyang dbas lhag par 'gyur ro/ / de sdang la myod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang / sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa

153b1: dadag bskal pa tsam du bstan kyang / de dag re yang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong du bzhugs pas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi
153b2: skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par 'gyur gyi/ sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pa gang yang med do// sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems
153b3: can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par 'gyur gyi/ sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pa gang yang med do// sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi spyod pa de tsam du tshad med pa de
153b4: yang de bzhin gshegs pas tshad dang ldan par ston to/ / zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji ltar sbyong ba khong du chud par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la 'byung ste/

155a1: btags na/ sems can gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar nges shes kyang / de la de bzhin

155b1: gshegs pa gzug kyil 'bar dgrad cag tu rang du 'akra bzhag bdag nas de bzhi glagags pa gsung ga dkyil 'khang dpag par bya snyam sa/ / da nas gnas san/ madz+ra dgal cu

155b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstangs pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas

155b8: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ da lta na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ chos kyang ston pa der gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu

156a1: chen pas phyin te/ de nas 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis skad de 'dra ba kha nar bas te/ 'dasas/ per/ 'das gang tsam kyi phyogs
156a2: 'dug pa'i mangs meg ci/ shos kyisgra thos pa de bzhin du gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyis khams de na gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung

156a4: chad byed do/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad par bya ba'i/ lhung bzed kyi rten ma gdu bu de la gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'chag cing
156a5: 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong

156b6: brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags te/ rin po che
156b7: gling de skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byas so/ / skyil mo krung de las kyang mu tig gi rgyan 'breng bye ba khrag khrig
156b8: brgya stong mngon par 'byeng ngo do/ / mu tig gi can 'greng gi 'bru thams cad las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo // /

157a1: 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi rtse mo dag las kyang pad+ma rna ma byung ngo // pad+ma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la yang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
157a2: gzugs bzhugs par snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams
157a3: te bsngags pa gsung ngo / / de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis thub par/
157a4: bgyi'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar stong dang stong gnyis khyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka'
157a5: stsal pa/ / mo bu dgal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'bral de bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug gos// de nas
157a6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni zhig gi slang du 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'dir mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des
157a7: bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad
157a8: ces bka' stsal to/ / mo'u dgal gya bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad med pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byin gyi khyod kyi lan gnyi su de lta bu'i sems ma skyed cig/

157b1: gal te mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod shugs 'di nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid kyis/ nub phyogs logs su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal bar song yang / khyod kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shA kya thub pa
157b2: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no// de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyi
157b3: la phyag 'tshal te/ nyes pa bshags pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal bas/ bdag ni nongs pa can te/ nongs pa 'chags so// bcom
157b4: ldan 'das bdag ji srid gcig nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung dgubacu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas/ khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// mo'u dgal gyi bus
157b5: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rI mo zhig nas mchis pas lus du ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'chi ba'i rngo mi thog go// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod
157b6: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod ni bcom ldan 'das shA kya thub pa nyid kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams
157b7: 'dir byin gyis/ khyad bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag tshol cig dang / de nyid kyis khyod slar khrid par 'gyur ro// mo'u dgal gyi bu gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni
157b8: pa srid kyis kyang phyin par mi nus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der ma phyin par/ bar du yongs su mya ngan las dang bar 'gyur ro// mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ shar ram/ lho 'am/ nub pa pa/ byang ngam/

158a1: phyogs gang zhig dpyad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag phyogs bslad de gang nas 'dir mchis pa ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dag la bya ba khyed kyis rnam grangs 'das kyang dra
158a2: ltar rig par bya ste/ gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni/ bskal pas kyang phyin par mi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya
158a3: bde bzhugs/ bka'astsal pa/ mau dgal kyi bu bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni shar phyogs legs na pazhugs so// de nas gnas brtan modro dgal kyibu chen pos/ de'i tshe de lag
158a4: lngas la gtugs te/ shar phyogs su phyag 'tshal nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mis mchod pa// yeshes ma 'a mas mtha' yas gsu ldan// rkang gnyis rnams kyis dam pa dgongs su
158a5: gsol/ / slar yang ning der rab du mchi bar gyi// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa des/ gnas brtan mo 'dags
158a6: gri bus gsol pa btab pa'i sbed thos so/ / thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dis de ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di sa nig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
158a7: 'astsal pa/ kun dga' ba 'dzin mo 'o dgal gyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ rub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung dag ban rgya dgu'i khyim snyed 'das par song ste/ jig rten gyi khangs 'od
158a8: gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar/ bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te/ de 'jig rten sems 'dir 'ong bar 'dod nas/ gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo // kun dga' bos gsol pa

158b1: bcom ldan 'das mo 'ud gal gyi bu chen po ci'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams der mchis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mo'u dgal gyi bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang 'di nyid du thos par 'gyur ro//
158b2: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi
158b3: rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po blta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab pasam pa mkhyen nas/ mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjes
158b4: su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 'ga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed po de dag las thal te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to//
158b5: de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas brtan mo'u dag la
158b6: gyi bu chen po yan lag lnga sA la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu
158b7: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su 'grongs shog shig/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te/ sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten
158b8: gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ spyan sngar yan lag lngas la

159a1: btags te/ / phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa bshags pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dpyad kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal nas/ de srid du ring du mchis par
159a2: bdag nongs pa can te nongs pa 'chags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de srid du ring du mchis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni/ 'di ni ci tsam pa de tsam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu
159a3: chen po ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshig gang yang med de/ mo'u dgal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tshad dam/ mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa de ni/ nam mkha'i tshad dam mtha'
159a4: yongs su tshol bar sems pa yin do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ci tsam du khyab pa de tsam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis khyab po// gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang / 'ongs pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ srog
159a5: chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin ka gegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /
159a6: sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam/ zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems can gcig gi sems dang / sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang
159a7: stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems cad thams cad rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba rnams kyis/ bskal par yang bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am// brtsi ba 'am/ brtag par mi nus na/ sems can thams cad kyi lta
159a8: smos kyang mi dgos/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyo khong du chud par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed par 'di lta ste/ sems

159b1: can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i gsung gi yan lag gi rnam pa yang de snyed du 'byung ste/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa'o// de la 'di skad
159b2: ces bya ste/ / stong gsum sems can gang yin pa// de dag dang rgyal 'dren mur pas// bskal par sems can gcig gcig gi/ sems kyi khams kyang mi shes so// sems can gcig yid ji snyed pa// sangs rgyas
159b3: kyis ni rab mkhyen kyang / / nga yis yid 'di shes so zhes// de ni rtog par mi 'gyur ro// dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sems dpa' dag ni ji snyed pa// 'jig rten mgon po chos ston tshe//
159b4: dbyangs kyi yan lag de snyed do// chos kyi bdag po gsung ba na// dbyangs kyi yan lag ji snyed pa// chos kyi ming gis bshad pa yi// chos bstan pa yang de tsam mo// sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni// ming dang //
159b5: sems dpa' ji snyed pa// sems can snying po'i spu gcig nas// 'od gzer 'byung ba de snyed do// 'jig rten mgon po'i spu kun gyis// 'od zer dag ni ji snyed pa// mi yi dbang po chos ston tshe// gsung gi yan lag
159b6: de bas mang / / dpa' bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyis// bskal par rab tu bstan mdzad kyang // sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung dbyangs kyi// mtha' ma rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams// gzugs can
159b7: min pa'i tshig gis brjod/ / gzugs can min pa'i tshig gis ni// nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed// ji ltar tshig ni gzugs med pa// thams cad du ni mi dmigs te// de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med pa// shin tu
159b8: dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar tshig ni yod min te// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar nyon mongs rnams med cing // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung // gang yang rnyed par

160a1: mi 'gyur ba/ / de ltar nyon mongs mi dmigs kyang // den tshig gis brjod pa yin// sems can dag na kun ma tshe// rab 'a bring thab gang yin pa// de dag lus dang sems mi gnas// gnas pa
160a2: med pa'ang ma yin no/ / ji ltar sil snyan la bral 'khor byas// rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba// sgra 'byin byed pa gang yang med// 'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung // de ltar sngon chad rnam dag phyir// sems can kun
160a3: gyi bsam pas bskyod/ / sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yang // 'di la de ni rtog mi mnga'// ji ltar brag cha rnams kyi sgra// nang dang byi rol mi gnas pa// de ltar mi yi dbang po'i gsung // nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so//
160a4: ji ltar rin chen mi rtog par// snang bas sems can tshe ma byed pa// de ltar rgyal ba'i mi rtog gsung // sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba ni/ sems can tham/
160a5: cad kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ skye ba'i gnas tha dad pa dag yod pa rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pas/
160a6: sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa/ ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa rnams kyi ming tha dad pa dag gis rnam par bzhag go// zhi ba'i blo gros 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang
160a7: sdug bsngal gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ sazla ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces byaste/ za ba dang / za ba'i rtsa ba dang / zabasel dang / zab 'gog byed ces bya'o// 'dir byug sngal dang / sdug
160a8: bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ bar snang gi lha rnams kyis 'diska ces bya ste/ 'jug pa dang / kun tu 'jug byed pa dade/ kun

160b1: tu 'jug bral dang / kun tu 'jug sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pad
160b2: rgyal chen bzhi' ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'byung ba dang / dpog pa dang / sreg pa dang / 'jig byed ces bya'o// 'di sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par
160b3: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pade kum cu cu gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'khor ba dang / kun snyan dang / zad pa dang / zad pa ldon par byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal
160b4: dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa dang / gnod pa rnyan dang / gnod/
160b5: zad dang / gnod pa zad par sgom pa zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dga'
160b6: ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces byaste/ shin tu sa m+ban dang mi mun rgya ba dang / ldog pa dang / yang dag par ldog byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug sde la kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /
160b7: thug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal po dang / kun tu rgyal byed dang / rgyal zad dang // rgyal zad sgo zhes bya ba'o//
160b8: 'dir sdug sngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/

161a1: haha ho dang / haha thob byed dang / ha ha pral dang / ha ha bral byed ces bya'o// 'dar sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal/ 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam nas
161a2: bya ba gang yin pa de/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ me mur dang / me mur gnod dang / me mur 'dor 'dod dang / me mur sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba
161a3: dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de tshangs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ sdug pa dang / sdug byed dang / sdug pa nyal dang / sdug par 'khor zhes
161a4: bya'o/ / 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'dzag
161a5: pa dang / kun tu 'dzag byed dang / rgyun gcod dang / shin du 'byung zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba
161a6: gang yin pa de tshangs pa'i mdun ni 'don gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rma dang / rma'i mtshams sbyor ba dang / rma rub dang / rma nye bar zhi byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun
161a7: 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal byed dang / rnam par rgyal byed dang / rgyal ba
161a8: mthar byed dang / byed pa tho cid ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'od chung gi/

161b1: lharnams kyi 'diska ces bya ste/ tidang / nye nyi dang / hu tra dang / ta bus na ti zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro
161b2: ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dge chung gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces byaste/ oM ti ti dang / ni ba ta dang / niganyis dang / nig man zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /
161b3: sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshad med dge'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ sten pa dang / yang dag par sbyin pa dang / zad bsten pa dang / kunaH
161b4: ston pa zhes bya'o/ / 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dge rgyas kyi
161b5: lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces byaste/ yongs gcod dang / yongs su gcod 'byung dang / khyim mtha' dang / rtag tun ma dag ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog
161b6: pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces byaste/ rjes su 'gro ba dang / mi 'ong ma yin pa dang / rjes kyi mtshams dang / rjes kyi mtshams
161b7: 'gro zhes bya'o/ 'di sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsnga kun byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/
161b8: dag pa dang / dag pa can dang / dag pa yongs dag dang / dag par 'gro zhes bya'o// 'di sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog

162a1: par 'grob sa pa'is ba gang la dbang / bya pa pang ga stan ra bye gad ces byaste/ mamam pa dang / mamal me dang / man+tad+han pa dang / ma dag sa zhes bya'o// 'dir drugru bsnga
162a2: dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ shin tu mthong gi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ grol ba dang / grol ba can/
162a3: dang / grol ba'i rtsa ba dang / grol ba'i bya brag phyid par mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
162a4: zhes bya ba gang yin pa ste/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi bya ba dang / mi byed pa dang / byed bral dang / byid pa mthar thug ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug
162a5: bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lar zhes bya ba gang yin pade/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og mi gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ mthar thug dang / shin tu mthar thug dang / mi rdog pa dang / nyid mtshams/
162a6: sbyor bar med pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar ji ltar lha rnams kyi bden pa rnams kyi banganas rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du/ khru rnams kyi yang gzhan no// gnod sbyin rnams kyi yang gzhan no// dri za rnams kyi yang gnan
162a7: no lha pa yid rnams kyi yang gnan no/ / nam mkha' lding rnams kyi yang gzhan no// ming ma ci rnams kyi yang gzhan no// lho 'phye chen po rnams kyi yang gzhan no// gnod sbyin lag na gnod thogs rnams kyi yang
162a8: gnan no/ / 'phreng thogs rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa yang gzhan no// zhi ba'i blo gros gang yul chen po bcu drug du bsdu bas bsdus pa'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yongs su gang ste/ gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang /

162b1: gzhan/ nges pa'i tshig kyang gzhan/ brda' yang tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas/ skad kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis/ bden pa dag rnam par bkod de/
162b2: 'di lta ste/ yul ka sha dang / bahu ba dang / tho gar yul dang / yab na dang / kam po dzi dang / kha sha dang / hun dang / rgya yul dang / dar ta dang / u ra sha dang / bi la ni dang / mo ma dang
162b3: bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / da ci ba dang / kir ta dang / bu lin ta dang / pun tra dang / ku ru na dang / lnga len dang / shar phyogs dang / phu ru ra ba dang / lho
162b4: phyogs dang / ka ling ka dang / gcer bu dang / ba na sa ka dang / ba na ta dang / sbal ka dang / khyi gdong dang / wag dong dang / kri ba shi'i gdong dang / spri'u tshugs pa dang / gnas gdong po dang / phyi phyogs
162b5: gdong dang / byang mtshamra gdong dang / rjes su rgyug dang / rgya mtsho'i khol pa dang / yul mthas gtugs pa dang / ad kur dang / mdo ku ra dang / sna med dang / glo bkra dang / phyogs
162b6: kyi gcer bu dang / gshegs thogs gcer bu dang / dgus te 'gro dang / rdzogs byed rnam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar na gnas pa'i yul las stsogs pa/ yul stong gis 'dzam bu gling yongs su gang
162b7: ste zhi ba'i blo gros gang na mi rnams kyi tshig dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda' tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag bstan kyang / de
162b8: bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhing / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brangang ba ma yin pa 'byung ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bden pa ming tha dad pas bstan pa

163a1: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yod de/ bden pa bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ don dam pa'i bden pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bden pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi bden pa
163a2: dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i bden par/ don gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// / bam po lnga pa// zhi ba'i blo blo ma gzhan
163a3: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gas rab ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dgas pa gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi so la nyas la pa'o// zhi ba'i blo blos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chad med
163a4: grangab med pa dag na/ sems can du bsdu ba rabasdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ste/
163a5: zhi ba'i blo gros yongs su brtag pa nye bar gzung nas/ sems cad de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i
163a6: pu'i shes rab dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa/ shA ri'i bu lta bu'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang
163a7: ye shes de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur cing / rnam grangs 'dis/ sems can thams cad shes rab dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros
163a8: sems can de dag thams cad kyi bskal ba'am/ bskal pa las lhag par the tsom gyi dri ba bsams shing gzhal te/ yongs su btsal la/ sems can gcig gi the tsom gyi dri ba gang yin pa de gnyis

163b1: yin / na nas cwa 'dis sems na mas pa gas // m+b+ha sa tugs pa shA
163b2: xxx/ xxx
163b3: chud pa shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis rnas pa lang bsan pas thams pa kyang sems rangs par 'gyu te/ zhi ba'i thathos ga/ ga / gsung ni sems canathams cad byedags pa med kyi
163b4: sems carnams cad kyisam kyi la cang/ gas pa la rdzams kyis marga pangs/ sang du rlung yang mi ma pa/ sa pa des mdzad/
163b5: shegs pa'i gsung shigs pa'o// 'di ni gsung ma dang byung ba'o// 'do ni ga sung yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang / gsung gigs pa dgas pa pa'i bang/
163b6: b.lan gyis pa/ pa'iH/ srog chags sus kyis ming gis/ med pa ya dag pa rdzogs pa'i bya sems paskyed do// brgal pa nga pa dang / nga narnamam sa dpa sangs
163b7: rgyas kyi gang da gang nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thadan/ tshangs par gyun pa stod pa'i byang chub sems dpa de gagis/ gas papa'i bdag pa la na rjel mchod 'i las kyang / ma
163b8: rnams cas kya ra/ ga pa cha gdags rnams kya ga // de nas me ga de / can ldan 'das kyis sprul pa rdzo/ gsang pa pa'i bad pa la rdo rje lus yang ga nga thams cad la yang

164a1: ya/ / 'thor // ri po ma'i gdugs de dag kyang bar snang la gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na 'dug go// na po che'i gdugs de dag las kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la brjod/
164a2: pabakye ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rdo rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis pa
164a3: khalags so/ / zhes sla byung ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i khong de ngo mtshar dugyur nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pa lag rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de/ chog 'di skad ces bdag cag gis/
164a4: gas ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos shing /
164a5: som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang
164a6: 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/
164a7: zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang ya
164a8: pade dag ni/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bstan to// bstod do// yang dag par bshad do// gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring par

164b1: mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'chang ba dang / mi sdang mi blag/ drag par mi byu ba dang don nogs pa'i dis sartogs pa dang / de bzhin
164b2: nyid du sgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med
164b3: bdag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// me tog gi char chen po yang bab po// sil snyan dang / rol mo'i sgra yang byung ngo // sems can grang med bdag gis ni byang chub
164b4: tu sems bskyed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni/ mi skye ba'i
164b5: chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni/ skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byas so// de nas 'khor gyi khyams
164b6: de'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa brtol to/ / mngon tu byung bar snang ngo // de dag steng gi bar snang nas tshangs kyi
164b7: 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sdes/ chus chag chag btab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi
164b8: ba'i blo grom la bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags te/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags// bcom ldan 'das/

165a1: sa pa/ sbrul / nga dranas rlung dz+nyAn 'ang dgas pasan tu dung du shAgs sa/ nga dag du na du dag
165a2: grangs 'di 'chang po dang / nga zhi pa na ma na de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ de dag na ma rig par gastan par 'gyur ba'i gi zigs pa cagan// ro kyi snang mi za pa dang/
165a3: dang / spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi thams da thams ca sems rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur te/ 'di na chos
165a4: kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gri gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o//
165a5: gas ba pa'i bdag po la gan rdorjes/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dezhi pa'i blo thos pa 'di ska ces smras go/ ni ba'i blo thos de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsung ba dang / thugs kyi 'dzin
165a6: las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gis bskal pa
165a7: brgyad bri bdi stong du gnas kyang / te dzo'o ci ci'i mtha mthug ga par du dag ge rnam pa ga 'das pa mag ma ba/ de nas shi bos nas/ las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du sgru ba yongs su 'den to//
165a8: ni ba'i blo grong dag du med shegs par rnam par shes pa yang mi gnas pa ste/ gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi

165b1: nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa phung ba'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la ldog pa ma mnga'/ thugs la rtog pa ma
165b2: mnga'/ thugs la rnam par dpyod pa mi mnga'/ thugs la 'gyur ba mi mnga'/ thugs kyi tshad mi mnga' thugs la 'khrug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la sel ba mi mnga'/ thugs la g.yeng ba mi mnga'/ thugs la khengs pa mi
165b3: mang 'a thugs la dma' ba mi mnga'/ thugs la kun du srung ba mi mnga'/ thugs na rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs la shin du rangs pa mi mnga'/ thugs la rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la khon du 'dzin pa mi mnga'/ thugs
165b4: la g.yo ba mi mnga'/ thugs la nges par sems pa mi mnga'/ thugs la gyes pa mi mnga'/ thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/ thugs la 'jug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la rab tu rgyu ba mi mnga'/ thugs la rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs
165b5: la rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la yongs su rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la zhi gnas mi mnga'/ thugs la lhag mthong mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba mi mnga'/ rang gi thugs la gnas
165b6: pa mi mnga'/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba mi mngar/ thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs gzugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/
165b7: thugs sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs chos la gnas pa mi mngar/ thugs dmigs pa la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs yid la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs nang na gnas pa
165b8: mnga'/ thugs phyi rol na gnas pa mi mnga'o// thugs de chos rnams la mi 'jug go// thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go// thugs de 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba la mi rtog go// zhi ba'i blo gros

166a1: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ thugs kyis chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la/ chos thams cad la yang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs pa 'jug go// rang gi
166a2: thugs yongs su dag pas/ sems can gang gi sems kyang yongs su ma dag par mi gzigs te/ de gzigs kyang / gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog go/ gzigs kyang spros par mi mdzad do// gzigs pas/
166a3: gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa mi gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi mig gi mthong ba dang ldan
166a4: pa ma yin/ chos kyi mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi gzigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i rna ba'i thos pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sngon gyi gnas
166a5: rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin la/ de chos thams cad dang ldan pa yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad la chags pa med par
166a6: ldan pa yin no/ / de'i de bzhin gshegaso pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni bsgrim pa mi mnga' zhing / lhun gyis grub la mngor par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar gnas so// sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la yang gzigs so
166a7: sems can thams cad kyi kur nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad mdzin pa yang bskol ba mi mnga'
166a8: ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni kun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang yang bral

166b1: hA/ / ga nag/ ta/
166b2: dag gags pas sgyu das shegs pa nyis pa gang pan ma sa/ me kya gas gas pa dang / sug 'phre me /

166b7: 'dus ma byas pa gnas pam na/ gnas / sa gas na gas rang la gnas pa
166b8: byi ma la gnas pa ma yin/ dge pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dge ba la gnas pa pa yin/ 'jig nan pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig tan las 'das pa la

167a1: garnas pa ma yin/ / khanam tho ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin// banam tho med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa dang babs pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'das pa/
167a2: la gnas pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin// khru ga gas na na la / sos brtags pa pa yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ zhi ba'i thathos de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i legs gnas pa
167a3: mi mnga'o/ / de chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la/ sems can la thugs brtse bas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnams la yang de'i ye shes mthong ba/ chags pa
167a4: mnga' zhing thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug pa ste/ de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsong bste
167a5: mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor la/ sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas/ thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang
167a6: ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa bzang po ba'i byang chub sems
167a7: dpa' gang dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zad na/ da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi slad dran yang/ gsas pa'i bdag po mchis lags sam
167a8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i ba bya ba 'di bsam gyis ma khyab gyis zhag she// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mag rmongs par 'gyur ro// de lha med

167b1: shA ri'i bu gang dag dad cing / dge ba'i bshis gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag/ gnas 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches
167b2: par mchi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis bsang ba ba'i bdag po la gan rdo rje na gtu nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus
167b3: mthong lags te/ 'di dag gis sngon ni nam yang ma mthong ngo // bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
167b4: kyi rgyabargyab na yang gnas te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang / mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du yang lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su kun tu ston to// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
167b5: gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rgyab rgyab du/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje/ lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan kyang / des ye shes kyi byin
167b6: gyis brlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro/ / shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na/ lag na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
167b7: gis gdong mthong lags te/ sngon ni ma mthong ngo // bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu gnas na/ khyod kyis de ma mthong ba ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa
167b8: 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba gang dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo // shA ri'i bu byang chub

168a1: sems dpa' byams pa dang / bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khri brgya stong dag sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyi rgyab na yang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rngo gnas
168a2: par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs de dag thams cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de dag gi rgyab na yang / 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ gsang ba pa'i
168a3: bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/ shA ri'i bu gsas pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje ni de ltar ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang ldan no//
168a4: gsang baba'i bdag po la ga rdo rje'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gan rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//
168a5: gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / bkod pa bstan pa la brtsams te/ de na rmad du byung ba'i/
168a6: rgyu gang dag byung ba/ gang du khyod la mngon sum du gyur pa la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa 'byung ba ni tshad med de de dag ni tshe'i tshad
168a7: bskal par gnas pas kyang / / rgya yar rnam par bye ste/ bstan par slab ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i bka' ba spyod pa ni rnam pa gcigs
168a8: yin te/ mu stegs can gzhom pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad do// dka' thub dang / lus la yongs su gtang ba ji snyed dang / yun pos su dus ji snyed kyis pha rol mu stegs can dag man

168b1: par skems pa de bas ches byed par du 'phags pa'am/ ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bya ba dang / brdul zhugs dang / dka' thub gang dag/ de dag gis byabs kun tu bstan par mi nus pa de dag thams cad
168b2: byang chub sems dpas kun tu bstan te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de la kha cig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya cig btsugs te/ bdug par mthong / kha cig gis ni lag pa bteg ste 'dug par mthong
168b3: kha cig gis ni nyi ma la/ / zhing 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mthong / kha cig gis ni cig tsog por bdug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa btsugs te mi
168b4: 'gul bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du bsgreng ste 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni las bu tu 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni tsher mo'i steng na nyal bar mthong / kha cig gis ni b.lang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal
168b5: bar mthong / kha cig gis ni rdo leb la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par mthong / kha cig gis ni rtsig pa la skyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb la skyes pa dang / kha cig gis ni gtun shing la snyes
168b6: pa dang / kha cig gis ni phyag dar khrod nas nyal ba dang / kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongs su bsgyur ba dang / kha cig gis ni shing leb gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtsa mur dza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig
168b7: gis ni d+hU ba la badza'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa ku sha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni ri dgas kyi pags pa byon pa dang / kha cig gis ni rtswa tsir gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sged mor 'dug pa dang /
168b8: kha cig gis ni rtswa dang b+ha'i gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang / kha cig gis ni sred za ba dang / kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni rtsa ba za ba dang / lo ma za ba dang / mi nog za ba dang /

169a1: 'bras thas pa dang / sdang zag dang / gagasas dang / pad ca bza pa dang / ga drug snang ba dang / gan pa dang / thags/ sagan/ dang /
169a2: dang / mon sran sde'u za ba dang / mon sran ze'u zab dang / bra yos za ba dang / til za ba dang / 'bras skam za ba dang / chu 'thung pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / mar gyi thigs btsam gyis 'tsha ba dang / s+tha
169a3: rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / 'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang / kha cig gis ni zas mi za ba dang / bcig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar mthong ngo // kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' shig tu mthong /
169a4: cig gis ni 'greng ba 'ba' shig du mthong ngo // zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang / dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston te/ lo drug tshang bar spyod lam gcig kyang /
169a5: ma 'khrugs par/ thams cad rdzogs par bstan pa chug// brtul zhugs shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dang / brtson 'grus shin tu sbyangs pa dang / dka' thub shin tu brtan pos lo drug du/ brtul
169a6: zhugs dang / dka' thub thams cad ston kyang / sems can gzhan dang gzhan la/ ma mos pa dag gis/ brtul zhugs dang / da/ khru ga/ nang banan du mi mthong ste/ gzhan du na ci 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs
169a7: dang bka' thub ci 'dra bdag gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub mthong ba ni ma gtogs so// zhi ba'i blo gros da la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du nam tho
169a8: med pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la/ bya ba de dag kyang kun tu ston te/ dka' ba spyad pa 'dis lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi theg pa gsum po dgal yongs su smin par byas so// zhi ba'i blo glos lha dang mi gang dag

169b1: chen pa mams pa yongs su byung babyas pa/ de dgagasan byang chub sems dpa' ngan bca 'khang pa chags pan 'jugs mkha' khyab kyikhas pa gtan ma thasam gtan dang / mags pa dang /
169b2: myong ba dang / lo drug lon nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo // zhi ba'i bla zas de la lha dang mi mos can chos 'dod pa/ chos gnabs yongs su smin par bya ba gang yin paded/
169b3: gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par mthong ste// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor g.ye shes chen pong dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o//
169b4: chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes byab// bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ bdud dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul shes bya'o// gapa'i thogros de ltar la d+hag
169b5: nas byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smos pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub de dag las langs te/ klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram du song nas/ 'jig rten dang 'thun par khrus byas te/ lus gtsang mang byas nas
169b6: klung ne ran dzan nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to/ / de na grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya ba des pa stong gi 'o ma bskol pa/ sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ngo //
169b7: gzhan lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug bcu yang rang rang gi zas thogs te 'khod nas/ sos
169b8: nas tshig 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gis bshos gsol cig/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig ces zer ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de na byang chub sems dpa' grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes

170a1: krung / dang / ba zug gru ca pa da dag thams cad sa dgu sa/ thams kyang pa can ma mthong // drangs /
170a2: byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bshos gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bshes gsol nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes so//
170a3: de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su smin par byas par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zas len par sbyor ba dka' ba spyod pa yang
170a4: dga' phags shes bya ba'o/ / zas len pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa/ bka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu gcig pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te/
170a5: lus stobs dang ldan par gyur nas zas zos te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de song ngo // der song ba dang / sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bus bzangs shes bya bags la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la bos te sna
170a6: pas 'dzin gang zhig mi g.yo mi bskyod pa/ / sred pas bsal zhing khong khro rab spangs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drung bye na// sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par bya// legs so zhes te sa la spyod rnams
170a7: dga'/ / stong gsum thams cad yongs su phyag dar byed// me tog sil ma bkram zhing spos mchog bdugs/ spos chu dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btab// lag na gzhong thogs de bzhin 'phreng ba thogs// gzhal
170a8: med khang gnas de bzhin par snang bas/ / de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'// de tshe me tog sna tshogs char du phab// gling bzhi pa dag rnams na skyong ba bzhi// ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcas te// rnam

170b1: par 'dren la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gser gyi drabs stong gsum thams cad bkag// stong gsum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// sum bcu rtsa gsum
170b2: rnam rgyal khang mdzes pa/ / de ltas stong gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan// 'thab bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' ste// skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir// mi mdzod 'jig rten khams kyi
170b3: stong gsum kun/ / nam mkha' bi dU ru'i dra bas bkab// dga' ldan rab dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang // de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byas// rgyan 'phreng de bzhin zla ga ma rnams kyang thogs// mu tig si la ma'i char
170b4: yang rab du 'bebs/ / lha yi rgyal po rab tu 'phrul gyi bar// rab tu dga' nas 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi// dril bu'i dra ba gser gyi drar bcas dang // skra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bkab// thams cad don la mi
170b5: 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir/ / dbang sgyur dag gis lha'i rin po che// rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa// 'od gsal dri med dra ba gcig kyang sbrel// klu dang dri za lto phye chen po dang // lha min mkha' lding mi'am
170b6: ci kun gyis/ / rang rang gnas dang bkod pa rnams kyis ni// 'dod lams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byas// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas sto dro gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang sbyar zhes bya bas byang chub
170b7: sems dpa'/ byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pogo
170b8: chen po bsnams pa/ dam bcas pa chen po mabor bgo cha sra ba nabs pa/ thugs yongs su mi skyob/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las nges par byung ba pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu

171a1: byon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mang 'dabang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin tu dam par dag pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su
171a2: zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin du zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs
171a3: pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur
171a4: glar pa chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po// shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi
171a5: chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ pad ma chen po lta bu chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma brnyel pa/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/
171a6: shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin du yongs su dag pa/ shin du dgar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub
171a7: sems dpa' de/ bdud kyi sde rab tu gdul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
171a8: yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang / chos kyi byin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems

171b1: can thams cad tu chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang / bas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ sangs byas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan par bzhed
171b2: pa dang / chos rnams la dbang phyug gi mda' dbang ba rnyed par mdzod pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la thogs po dag byed/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la slo bar gyi shig/ de nang
171b3: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pad/ yid rabatu dga' nas/ tshangs rigs kyi lha thams cad la smras pa/ thogs pa dag bskal pa brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang
171b4: dka' thub rags pa/ skyes bu chen po dam pa ste/ byang chub kyi snying pog/ la bder bzhud kyis// de la khyod kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyan par gyi sh+log/ de nas
171b5: pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can rnam dag btul zhugs chos nges pa/ lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la ban bzhed pa/ lha dang mi yis mchod pa lha yi la//
171b6: thub pa chen po byang chub snying por gshegs// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni gdul ba dang // thams cad mkhyen gyiye shes 'tshang rgya dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bskrad dang / dam pa'i chos
171b7: kyi 'khor le skor ba dang / / mkhas pa seng ge'i sgra chen bsgrags pa dang // sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang // dam pa'i chos mig yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir// 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs/
171b8: pas kyi rgol ba rnams ni char gcod dang // sngon gyi dam bcas yongs su bkang ba dang / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir// 'dren pa byang chub snying par nye bar gshegs// legs par thams cad ldan

172a1: cigazhung ma ni/ / sa yi bzhi ni legs par brgyan par bya// stong gsum brgyan par gyur la nyo shig kye// 'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par 'gyur ba ltos// 'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin// de ltar
172a2: gzugs kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya/ / tshangs pa rnams ni sems dang legs so zhes// rab tu dga' nas stong gsum brgyan par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams ni bkod snang ba// de bas lhag pa'i mchod pa'i de
172a3: dag bstan/ / me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spras kyis bkang/ rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags// tshangs pa la stsogs 'og min lha'i rnams// rab tu dga' nas stong gsum thams cad kyang // dga' bar gyur dang phyag
172a4: bya'i 'os su byas/ / ngang rang gnas kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas// lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong du yang // lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// lha mi'u mo bye ba drug bcu brgyas// byang chub rdo rje gdan ni brgyan
172a5: par byed/ / spos chu yis ni kun tu chag chag 'debs// me tog sna tshogs dag kyang 'thor bar byed// sa gzhi dag la rin chen rnams kyang bkram// byang chub snying por rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// thams cad tshig gis
172a6: brjod par mi nus pa/ / de snyed tshad kyi bkod par ning byas gyur// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po mi mdzad kyi bdag pos/ tshangs ris kyi
172a7: lha thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang // dka' thub rnams kyi spyod bskyad ba/ sems can gyi mchog/ skyes bu chen po 'di/ byang chub kyi steng /
172a8: por bzhud kyis de la khyed kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad/ bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan par gyis shig/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs rigs kyi lha'i

172b1: burnams la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos des la// par bzhed 'jig rten do mdzad pa dag nyid rje// don thong na spang bcas pa dang 'dul du// shang gi dbang
172b2: po byang chub drang du bzhud/ / thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dod par bya// stong gsum mi mjed 'di ni brgyan par bya// 'di ni ltar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang // yang dag mchod na bsod dmas mtha' yas
172b3: 'gyur/ / tshangs pa de dag yis tshig mchog de thos nas// stong gsum thams cad ma lus brgyan byed cing // legs par daphyogs ne ma tog rgyal mtshan brgyad// 'jig rten khams rin che rang bzhin sprul/
172b4: kau maM zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa dang // bye ba'i gdugs rnams nam mkhar de dag sprul// sa la'i shing rnams me tog mchog spras pa// dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis sprul// lam gang nas dri drang srong che gshegs la/
172b5: da shing rta bdun bsdams chad du sprul// rin chen gzhi la gser gyi pad ma pa lam// bakhyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor// brgya byin gyis deng bkod pa gang byas pa// de dag lnga pi rnams kyis sdon pa mthong /
172b6: supa bcugasu pa dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar// de ltar gling bzhi dag ni mdzes par brgyad// 'thab thal lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul pa dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'og pin lha yi rnams// skabs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson
172b7: par ni/ byang chub snying bor pa pa brgyan par byed// byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i bar der ni// 'dod pa'i khams 'dir dkon mchog gang yod pa// lha'am klu'am mi'am ci rnams kyi// de dag thams cad skar
172b8: cig de la bstan/ / phyogs bzhi dag nas lha mo bye ba lpags// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa yis// byang chub shing ni mngon du brgyan par byed// spos chu yis ni kun du chag chag 'dabs// byang chub shing ni leg

173a1: bang sa na ma'o/ / tham panA gsums 'dul// rnams pa ba dgags sangs smra pa// shad pa dag chags ma sa// na dun byung rgya smrams dag rgya
173a2: snying por 'grob na/ rkang pa'i mthil 'khor la rtsi bas stod pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i ste gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig tan pa'i sems can thams
173a3: cad kyi sdug sngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyun gcod do/ / klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur to// de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos byang chub sems dpa'i 'od mthong nas/ tshim zhing mgul yid rangs
