197b1: bltan sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ lus sim par byed pa/ sems la dga' ba bskyed pa yon tan gyi tshigs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa bsngags pa'i bstan pa tshad med pa ste/ 'khor gyi byams der seng ge'i dri rin po tsho
197b2: rtsabs brgyan pa/ ni ba che'i 'khyer gyis bskor bar rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yog pa mig sangs ris su bres pa/ lha'i ras btsas bu dum bting ba/ steng du rin po che'i dra
197b3: bkres pa/ bkod pa ldan ma mthong / mthos pa 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dgan med pa brgya stong mang po byung ngo / zhal zas dathob brgyas bsgos pa'ang bshams so// seng ge'i dril yirten pa brgyas
197b4: yang bzhag ste/ seng ge'i khri re'i bar snang la yang rin po che'i gdugs rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag bres so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi byams bkod pa dang / seng ge'i
197b5: thi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu byas nas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de'i nub mo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i nal zas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam
197b6: bas yongs su dag pa/ ro bro ba mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mchod pa mang po yang bshams nas nam langs pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la smras pa/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bos bcom
197b7: ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu/ gas ya pa rang gi gnas su spyan drangs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnang gis/ de la byed dpung dang bcas/
197b8: g.yog 'kho dang bcas par mig yeng ba'i sems kyis zhag bdun gyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya bar spro bar gyis shig/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po

198a1: dang yi dgas dang / sha za dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / gsangab pa dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan dga' khod pa de dag la yang grogs po dag shes par
198a2: kyis shig/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor 'dir spyan drangs na gshegs par gnang gis/ de la khyed kyis ngan sems med pa dang sdang ba med pa dang / dga' ba dang dad pa dang mchog tu dga' bam
198a3: pas bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur gyes shig chos kyang nyon cig ces poska'o/ / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po brgyad pa/
198a4: de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu thu bo rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba la/ smras pa// bzhin bzangs khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la tshangs ris nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi bar gyis rta rnams la/ bcom
198a5: ldan 'das gsang bapa'i dag po lag rdo rdzorje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis khyod kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa/ de myur du shog shig ces sbron cig/ yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te/ ji skad bsgo ba
198a6: bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu des byas so/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu gnyis pa lag bzangs shes bya ba la smras pa// khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la/ sa bla ba'i lha rnams nas
198a7: bzung ste/ bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab 'bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams la/ bcom ldan 'das
198a8: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyis/ khyed kyi nang nas su lha 'dod pa de myur du shog shig ces sbron cig/ yab de ltar bgyi'o zhes te/ ji skad bsgob

198b1: bzhin du/ gzhon nu lag bzangs kyis byas so// de nas skad cig thang cig yud mdal 'dod par spyad pa dang / gzugs na spyad pa'i ltang bu brgya snang dag gis dpag chad 'khar yug gi bar snang khyab par byung /
198b2: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa bshams te/ nam nangs pa dang / pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
198b3: sbyar ba bdud nas/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tsho dbab pa gsol pa/ thub pa chen po dus 'di lags// skyes bu gtso bo gshegs su gsol// skyes bu
198b4: dam pa gshegs su gsol/ / skyes bu cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol// thub pa chen po gdugs tshod bab// rkang gnyis gtso bo gshegs su gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa gshegs su gsol// rkang gnyis cad
198b5: mkhyen gshegs su gsol/ / tshul khrims pad ma'i rdzing nas 'khrungs// brtson 'grus chab kyis rnam par 'phel// slob ma bung ba sgra 'byin pa// thub pa pad ma gshegs su gsol// 'phags pa'i bden par gnas
198b6: bcas te/ / byams dang thugs rje'i spyan mara' zhing // bdag med pa yi sgra sgrogs pa// rgyal ba med ge gshegs su gsol// joms ni rtsa ba chub dran// byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan// rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs//
198b7: rgyal ba sdong po gsheg su gsol// shes rab rgya chen zab pa po// ting 'dzin chab ni grang ldan zhing // rnal 'byor pa yi tshang pas gtam// yon tan rgya mtsho gshegs su gsol// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor dpal ldan pa// shes rab 'o/
198b8: bair legs par brgyad// slob ma pad ma kha 'bed pa// thub pa nyi ma gshegs su gsol// pas kyi rgol bas mi bskyod cing // rnam thar la sogs sman tshegs can// slob dang mi slob ri dgas gtam//

199a1: thub pa'i po gshegs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gdugs tsho bab par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gsang ba pa'i bdag
199a2: pos gdugs chod pab kyis chos gos byon la lhung bzed thogs shig/ zhag bdun byin gyis brlab pa byin gyis brlobs la/ gtsug la ga khang skyong bsgos shig/ de nas nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rdzu 'phrul
199a3: dang ldan pa de dag ning gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bar snang las dong ngo / / gang dag rngu 'phrul dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kyi brod du zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan gcig dunam mkhar
199a4: dkyil gyi lam nas dong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i rilas snang bar mi 'gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du ba dang / lha'i tshigs kyis ni mngon
199a5: par bstod/ lha'i bu mo rnams ni glu dbyangs len/ 'od zer ni 'gyed/ me tog gi char ni 'beg/ rol mo sil skan bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len/ zhing rnams ni g.yo bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang rdzu
199a6: 'phrul chen pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chom rdul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa/
199a7: rten pa dang / rangs rgyas kyi rnams/ rol pa chen pos lung la can gyibarje 'dzo gal bder rnam mapa di kyil zil ma nas dang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thugs pa med par gshegs pa dang /
199a8: 'dod par spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag nis/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa ni mi mnga'/ zhima'i dkyil bar 'char bani 'dra/ zla ba'i na pa'i di yi

199b1: 'khor srung pa'i tshogs kyis bsor ba dang ni mtshungs/ lha'i rgyal po brgya byin ltar lnga'i tshogs kyis ni bskor/ tshangs pa chen po ltar tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis ni bsod cing / gshegs par kyang rangs
199b2: nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyed te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i me tog sud dpal dang / kuru
199b3: dang / dab ma dkar po dang / man dAr ba dang / man dA po chen po dang / yongs 'du dang / yongs 'du chen po dang / man 'ju shi ka dang / man 'dzushag chen po dang / sbrul dang / sbrum chen po dang / mngog
199b4: mdzes dang / mdog mdze sa chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / dri zhim dang / pad ma mad brgya dang / 'dabastong dang / skar 'od dang / skar ma dga' dang / kun tus bsrung dang / bsrung rta
199b5: dang / rtag tu me tog chags mig du sdug pa de dag dang / me tog gzhan dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / pa dan dag kyang bsgreng ngo // rol mo se la snyan brgya
199b6: stong yang len to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa rnams pa de lta bu/ me tog gi char 'bes pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan
199b7: byi chang 'bes pa dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo sbed dang lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu len pa dag dang / skad cig zad cig yul tsam de la/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
199b8: dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'dun khang du bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sa la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sa chen po dal zhing mi drag la sems cad thams

200a1: cad la mi gnod par g.yos par gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhes/ bcom ldan 'das ljang lo can gyi po brang 'khor du byon par rig nas// myur ba myur bar la gor du btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ gtan gyi
200a2: dang bcas te/ me tog dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i
200a3: me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ thal ma sbyar tes/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhang phyags gcag tu 'khod do// btsun mo'i
200a4: 'khor dang / dpung gi tshogs dang / 'khor 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas btud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal
200a5: po chen po bzhi la brtsams te/ 'khor de ltar 'dus pa de dag la da lta bu'i gtam gyi sbyor ba mdzad pas klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bram dang / srin po'i 'khar de'i nang nas/ srog chags
200a6: khri nyi stong gis byang chub du sems bskyed do/ / rgyal po chen po de dag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas/ bud med khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i
200a7: btsun me'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas shing/ 'khor dang yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas te// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byu ga ba
200a8: dang / phye ma dang / gas dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams cad thogs shing / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang / lhan cig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos

200b1: kye bu'i 'dun 'ang gal ba dang / com ldan 'das gal ba der song ste/ byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i ma
200b2: tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ sil snyan dang
200b3: ral mo byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dper tshogs dang bcas par ldan cig sung nga gi 'bor gyi thams su spyan drangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor bya byas
200b4: dengs la mi rten pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyid kyi ser ge'i gdan ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan pos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang stan ci rigs pa
200b5: dag la 'khod do/ / de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rjes brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang lha'i 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la bsrung bgyis
200b6: shig/ mchod pa dang rim gro gyis shig/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de la gang dag yi rang dang / zhal ta bya ba byed pa ni// de dag bsod nams skal ba can// de dag yon ni chung ba min// zhes bka' stsal gyis de la
200b7: grogs po dag khyod kyis rjes su yi rang bldan da dang / zhal ta bya ba dang ldan pa'i bsod dmas bya ba'i dngos po long shig/ de nas lha'i bu de dag gis 'khor gyi byams bkod pa de dang / seng ge'i khri bkod pa yang mthong ngo // de mthong
200b8: nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ / 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'am// 'o na de gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i 'am// su'i yin zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / de dag gis par snang las 'di ni gsang pa pa'i byin gyi

201a1: rlabs yin te/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa zhes bya ba de na
201a2: de bzhin gshegs pa dkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba chos ston pa der gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag/ rdo rjes bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mthong nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bkod pa de nyid 'khor gyi khyams 'dir byin gyis
201a3: brlabs so/ / zhes sgra thos so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan de la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang /
201a4: dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
201a5: gcig tu 'khod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud do// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan ci 'khor la smras pa// khyed thams cad
201a6: lhan gcig tu 'dus la lhan gcig tu tshur shog/ ji ltar bshams pa'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das la gsol cig/ de nas gsang tha bar dag po lag na rdo rje btsun me'i 'khor dang bcas/ gnyen gyi 'khor dang
201a7: bcas/ bu dang bcas dbang dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ rang gi lag nas gus par sti stang du byas te/ bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa mang po/ ro bro ba mang po du ma dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
201a8: lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ bsna

201b1: ste tshim par byas so/ / bstabs ste tshim par byas nas lhung bzed bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag bcabs par rig nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// lcang lo can
201b2: kyi pho brang 'khor na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po gang ya ni pa de dag kyang / 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/ 'khod par 'gyur to// lcang lo can du
201b3: gshegs nas bshos gsol pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcwa brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa ci nas byang chub
201b4: du sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang dri za dang / gsang bab
201b5: dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang / khyad par gyis khyad par dra mngon pa bzhugs par 'gyur ba dang / nyams pa'i chos
201b6: mi 'gyur bar de ltar chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i ler
201b7: de la bka' stsal pa/ / grogs po dag de'i phyir legs par rab du nyon la yid la zud cig dang bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gang la zhugs na/ khyad par du mngon du 'phags par 'gyur zhing nyams pa'i
201b8: can du nga mi lung chos kyi tshul khyed la bstan par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnya/

202a1: ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'disad ces bka' stsal to// thogs po dag 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi ba mebs ma pa thag pa nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems brtse
202a2: dad pa yin dang ba mang zhing 'phags pa rnams la lha 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa dang / ser sna med par btang ba gtor ba dang / lag bzang ste gtang ba la dga' ba dang / mchod sbyin byed par
202a3: dang can dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sbyin pa byed pa la dga' ba dang / khong khro med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / de las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa
202a4: dang / mos pa dang rtogs pa dang / somanyamed la/ the tsom sa pa nga / yid gnyis mthab yin/ dedang po dang / nag po'i las rnams kyi rnam par srin pa chud mi za bar gnas/ srog gi byer yang
202a5: mi bya ba mi byed de/ de srog gcod ba spangs pa yin/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba dang / brna
202a6: sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spangs pa yin te/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa yin no// de dad par 'gyur nas dge sbyong ngam bram ze ga pa dag yang dag par song ba dang /
202a7: yang dag par zhugs pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / nges pa dang dge ba'i chos can dang / mang du thos pa dang / thos pa la mngon par brtson pa dang / tshul/
202a8: bani yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson pa dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / ngo zlog phod par smra zhing gtsam bur mi smra ba dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can dang / mi dge ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / mi rgod

202b1: padang ma khengs pa dang / maco sgrub ma yin pa dang / tshigs 'tshal ba dang / dran pa nye ba gnas pa dang / shin mnyam par bdag par sems dang ldan pa dang / phrad pa rnam chad pa dang / zug du byu/
202b2: ba dang khung bong ba dang / so mnya las nges par thal pa dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / yang srid pa las rgal ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dge sbyong dang / zam
202b3: zernam pa de la bral dge ba'i bshes gnyen du riganas/ ston to// sten to// bsnyen paparang byed do// mnyes par byed cing / mi mnyes par mi byed la dgyes par byed de/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mnyes par byas //
202b4: chas kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar yang dag par ston/ tshul khrims
202b5: kyis ni mtho ris su skye ba dang / thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang / bsgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur bar yang dag par ston to// 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni ser sna'o// 'di ni ser
202b6: sna'i rnam par smin pa'o/ / 'di ni tshul khrims so// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni bzod pa'o// 'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus so// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o/
202b7: 'di ni bsam gtan no// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni shes rab bo// 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab bo// 'di ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni
202b8: lus kyi legs par spyad pa'o/ / 'di ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'o// 'di na lus kyi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni ngag gi legs par spyad pa'o// 'a

203a1: ni ngag gi legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o/ / 'di ni ngag gi nyes par spyad pa'o// 'di ni dag gi nyes pa skyed pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi legs par spyad pa'o// 'di ni yid kyi lem
203a2: par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o/ / 'di ni yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'o// 'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o// 'di ni dge ba'o// 'di ni mi dge ba'o// 'di ni bya'o// 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o// 'di byas na
203a3: yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// zhes de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston// yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs
203a4: stod/ / yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do// de nas de dag snod du rung bar mkhyen nas/ zab mo'i gtam 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang / mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam dang / mngon par//
203a5: 'du byed pa med pa'i gtam dang / ma skyes pa'i gtam dang / ma byung ba'i gtam dang / bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang / thog med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i gtams tu ston to// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam 'di lta ste/
203a6: 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di byung / 'di med pa'i phyir 'di mi 'byung / 'di yod pa'i phyir 'di skyes/ 'di med pa'i phyir 'di 'gag pa 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/
203a7: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rten gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/
203a8: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal

203b1: kyi phung po chen po ba shig pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'di med pa'i phyir// 'di mi 'byung 'di gags pas 'di dgags/ 'di sa ma rig pa gags pas 'a byung na/
203b2: du bye gags pas/ rnam pa rigs pa // rnam pa dashes pa 'gags pas/ rnye dang ga rnags 'gag pa dngag zugs gags pas/ pa drug
203b3: 'gags pas/ dag pal// ga pa gag pas/ tsha pa gag tshor pa gags pas/ srid pa la / mid pa 'thugs pas/ len ga/ 'an pa gags pas/ ga
203b4: srid pa 'gags pas/ skye ba 'das/ skye ba 'gags pas/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / blasags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / yid mi ba ba dang / 'thug pa rnams 'gag par gyur u0f7f/ dmang na mug
203b5: kye phung batshan pa'ab shig pa 'di gag par 'gyur/ / dam na par na 'byung ba'am/ gag pa'i chos gang yang med de sa rkyenan tsham thams cad na mi tham thus ste ba ga dpa/ byed pa mang ba
203b6: bab med pa/ cu dang rgyan pas snang ba'o// 'dil 'jug pa 'am/ ldag pa'am/ rjes su 'jug pa'i chos gang yang med de// gzhan dun ma dag pa ma mnipa/ kun tu gti mug pas rnams gsum pa 'dags par 'byung ba/ 'am
203b7: rjes su 'dzug pa dang las kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i/ 'dags pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs sa// yang dag pa ra yin pa kun du ky-i mug pa yang / yang ga yin pabazhin du sangs brta
203b8: chos gang yang rgyas gang gi byed pa por 'byung ba mad de/ / gang ma byed pa par mi migs pa del 'dug med/ ldog pa med do// zhes brjod par bya'o/ chos bamo tam da / bu thos nas soma'i me do// bitsam mi 'o//

204a1: chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste/ de gzugs la mi 'chags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la ma chags so// de mig dang / gzugs dang / mig sa
204a2: rnam par shes pa la ma chags so/ / rna ba dang / snga dang / lce dang / lus dang yid dang / chos rnams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mchags sa// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / chos thams
204a3: rang bzhin gyis dben par yid ches so/ / grogs po dag de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyu ro// dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen
204a4: bkur byed pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ / de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
204a5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur// dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// de brtson 'grus brtsams
204a6: pas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro/ / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bran pho dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zhogs 'tsho ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i yongs su spyod padon du gnyer bar mi byu / de na tshed
204a7: gzhon nur rnam par rtse ba la mi dga' bas na tshod mdzes pa la bab pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur du rab tu 'byung ngo // de dad pas rab tu byung nas/ dge
204a8: ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / dge ba'i grogs po dge ba thob par byed pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bsam pa thab bo// de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos rnams nyan to// sgrub pa snying por byed

204b1: kyi tshig lngar len pa'i blo dang ldan pa ma yin no/ / mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin te/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis 'thob//
204b2: pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi ri bar gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston to// bdag gi tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar gzhan dgal chos mi ston to// de ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin
204b3: du gzhan dag la chos ston to/ / chos nyan pa rnams la ni byams pa chen po 'thob bo// sems can thams cad lani snying rje chen bskyed do// de mang du thos par 'gyur bas lus dang srog lam lta ba yin/ 'dod pa
204b4: chung pa dang / chog shes pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / mgu sla ba dang / gso sla ba dang / dgon pa dang / bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la yongs su rtog pa yin
204b5: ni don la rton pa yin te/ tshig 'bru rton pa ma yin no// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rton par 'gyur ba yin no// bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir brtson pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/
204b6: blad med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo// bag yod pa lhur len pa yang yin te/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po sdom pa'o// de mig gis gzugs rnams
204b7: mthong nas/ mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin na// de gzugs rnams kyi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rna bra
204b8: sgra rnams dang / snas dri rnams dang / lces ro rnams dang / lus kyis reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis chos rnams shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su ma 'dzin pa yin te/ chos rnams kyi

205a1: do myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ 'di ni pa g.yod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bgayod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems rjes su spang ba dang /
205a2: nyon mangs pa la dga' ba sems pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'dug pa dang / 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /
205a3: dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'i sgrub med pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i rgyub med pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la
205a4: byed pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// grogs po dag de ltar na bag yod par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang /
205a5: pag yod pa dang ldan pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dad pa mang ba dang / rtag tu 'thun pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang chos 'dod par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 'jig rten pha rol tu
205a6: ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med pa yin te/ de'i sems nyes par spyod pa la mi 'gro'o// 'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang chos spyod pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan
205a7: par 'gro ba yin te/ sangs rgyas mthong ba rnams mnyes par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam la yang gnas so// che ba nyid kyang 'thob bo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po che ba nyid thob nas che ba nyid 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
205a8: pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shin tu grub pa dang / bde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la tsan/

205b1: par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag pa sngon gyi dge bIrtsa ba rnams kyis 'ongs pa'i 'khor 'di lta ba rta pa la ltos// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shin tu brtson par bya'o//
205b2: ba ba'i bdag po ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po bag yod par gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de la bag yod pa
205b3: sems rjes su srung ba dang / yul 'dor ba dang / 'dod pa la dga' ba rnam par spong ba dang / chos kyi dga' bal sten pa dang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par 'a
205b4: pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / mi dge ba rnams dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang / lus dang ngag dang
205b5: yid kyi gnas ngan len rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa nas/ nyams pa'i cha da thun par 'gyur 'i chos thams cad kying rgyu ba med pa te/ dini pa g.yod pa zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang ldan zhing bgayod pa dang ldan pa des
205b6: brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang / dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang
205b7: ldan pa des/ / dran pa dang shes bzhin la brtson par bya'o// dran pa dang shes bzhin des byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad chung za bar mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang / bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus da/
205b8: dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes so// gang med pa de

206a1: yang med par rab tu shes so/ / de la yod par gang / med pa ni gang zer/ yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod de/ 'di ni yod pa zher bya'o// de la med pa
206a2: gang zhe na/ log par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de/ de ni bde pa zhes bya'o// gnan yingal pa dang rnam par smid pa ni yod do// gang las de dang rnab par smin pa dang ldan pa de ni med
206a3: do/ / gzhan yang kur rdzo ba mig dang / rna ba dang sA dang / khre dang lum dang / yid ri yod do// gang mig nas yid kyi bar dang ldan pa ni pad do// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus bcum pa la ni byang chub
206a4: yod do/ / lal can la ni byang chub med do// phyin ci log las byung ba'i phung po lnga dag ni yo da // rgya med pa la chos 'byung ba ni byed do// gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can
206a5: gzugs ni yod do/ / rtag pa dang brtan pa dang / ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gaga' pa'i gzugs de ni med do// de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos
206a6: cad kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yod do// rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug dang mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang / yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i rngam par shes pa de ni med
206a7: ro/ / ka zhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de dag ni yod do// ma rig pa med pa na/ 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de dag med do// 'du byed kyi rkyed gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do// 'du byed rnams ber na/ rnam pa
206a8: she ba ba zhes bya ba med do/ / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang / gzugs zhes bya ba yod do// rnam par shes pa medar/ ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni med do// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni yod do//

206b1: mang dang gzugs med/ skyem ched drugaces byang med da lta pa ched drug gargyan gyis ga shes bya ba den ma / rgyab ca dug dan/ rab pa kyi ca bags bya bar na ma nga/ dgapa bdan/
206b2: tshang ba zhes bya ba de medang// tshar ba'i rgyan kyis bu pa zhes bya ba dan med// tshar ba med na/ sred pazhes bya ba mad nga// srid pa'i can kyis led pa zhes byabar na yang sa/ smad pa bdan/ len pa zhes bya bde ba dang/
206b3: pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba den yod do// len pa medan/ srid pa zhes bya ba de med do// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de ni yod da// srad pa med na/ skye ba zhes bya ba pa dang // skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang /
206b4: smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni yod do// smra ba med na/ rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'jug pa
206b5: med do/ / gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba bad// sbyin pas dpral por 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul khrims kyis mtho risas skye ba ni yod do// tshul khrims kyis ngan song du skye ba ni med do// thos pas shes rab chen
206b6: por 'gyur ba ni yod do/ / thos pas shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba ni med do// bsgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do// bsgom pas 'bral bar ma 'gyur ba ni med do// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan na nyon mongs/
206b7: 'byung ba ni yod do// rdul bzhin ma yin pa yid byed pa dang bral na/ nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni med do// mngon pa'i dmyal can lani/ kun shes pa brda' spong pa med do// mngon pa'i rgyal med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa
206b8: yod de/ / gzhan yang thams cad kyi rjes su sor ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do// nang gi rjes su sor ba'i bdag ni med do// ye shes dang ldan pa la ni thar pa yod do// nga rgyal dang ldan pa la ni 'byung ba med do// bdag gam/ sems

207a1: can nam/ srog gam/ gang zag ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni med do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na/ bag yod pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa sa 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnam
207a2: la yod par grags pa gang yin pa de ni yod par rab tu shes so/ / 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la med par grags pa gang yin pa de ni med par rab tu shes so// de yod do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chags so// med de//
207a3: shes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chags te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa yang dag pa'i don rjes su rtogs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad mdor bsdus
207a4: te/ chos kyi mdo bzhir rnam par bzhag go// bzhi gang zhe na/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang / lha tshe rings po rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba
207a5: dang / lha dang mi bde bar 'du shes pa rnams kyi gnom pa'i phyir/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngam zhes bya ba dang / mu stegs can bdag smra ba rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /
207a6: rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa mngon pa'i rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba zhes bya'o// gas dab pa'i bdag po mi rtag ces bya ba de ni/ shin tumi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// sdug
207a7: bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral ba'i tshig bla dgas so/ / bdag med ces bya ba deni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du byab tshig bladas
207a8: sogs ngab pa'i bdag po de ltar na/ chos thams cad la de ltar mos shing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las minyams ning yongs su nyams par

207b1: mi 'thar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba
207b2: chen po bzhi po bdag cag 'jig rten stong ba zhes bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ji ltar 'jig rten bsgyung bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po can po bzhi la 'di skad ces pa
207b3: stsal to/ / grogs po dag khyed kyis chos kyi bya bas 'jig rten skyong shig/ de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'dzag rten skyong bar byed pa'o// bcu ga zhen/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod spong ba dang /
207b4: rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / gzhan gyi chung ma dag la mi 'phyo ba dang / chos spyod pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang / phra ma'i tshig med de/ zher mi 'debs pa dang /
207b5: tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te/ gzhan la mi slu ba dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la 'dod pa med pa dang / gnod sems nye bar zhi ba dang / lta ba yongs su dag cing yang dag par song ba ste/ grogs po dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi
207b6: lam de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o/ / thogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / thams
207b7: cad du 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / drang ba dang / mnyen pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdung
207b8: pa ste/ grogs po dag chos brgyad po de dag ni 'jig rten skyod par byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ston pa

208a1: dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du
208a2: 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o// de bzhin du ston pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
208a3: mkhas pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i ngag dang / yid kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang gus par
208a4: bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba gnyis pa dang / gsum pa'o// rnyed pa gang dag chos dang 'thun pa chos kyis rnyed pa/ tha na lhung bzed kyi nang du chu ba 'am/ ltung
208a5: bzed par gtogs pa de lta bu'i rnyed pa dag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / lhan gcig tu rnyed pa 'thun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa
208a6: yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa'o// tshul khrims mnyams pa/ skyon med pa
208a7: na ma yin pa/ sra sre ma yin pa/ rang dbang can/ ma 'phags pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa/ gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i
208a8: tshul khrims rnams kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang / lhan cig du tshul khrims 'thun par bya'o// snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / mgu bar

208b1: bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdub dang / ting nge 'dzin bya bar 'gyur ba/
208b2: lnga pa'o// lta ba gang 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba nges par byed pa'i rlung phun pa byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa nges par 'byung ba'i lta ba de lta bus tshangs pa mtshungs
208b3: par spyod pa rnams dang / lhan cig tu lta ba 'thun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang /
208b4: gus par bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / bsdu ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba drug pa ste/ grogs po dag yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos drug po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyor bar/
208b5: zang pa' tshas bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gtimag dang / 'jigs pa spangs pas/ 'dod pas 'grob ma yin par ma 'grob dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /
208b6: gtamug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste/ grogs po dag 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa'i chos bzhi pa de dag ni 'jig rten skyor bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang
208b7: 'jig rten stong bar byed pa'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa ste/ chos gnyis po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar
208b8: byed pa'i chos ni gcig kho na ste/ 'di lta ste/ bden pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa/ bka' blo bde ba ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa// gya gyu med pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa ste/ grogs po dag chos gcig po de ni 'jig rten skyong bar

209a1: byed pa'o/ / grogs po dag dalta bu'i chos la brtson na 'jig rte myong bar byed de/ grogs po dag byed kyis chos de lta bal brtson pas/ 'jig rte myongs shig 'jig rte myong ba'i le she ma sna ba ga pa'o//
209a2: dedas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du gongs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag brjod pas 'khor 'di thams cad dge ba dang ldan par gyu ba dang / de gshegs pa'i byang dub 'di yang yung ring druganas par 'azung ba'i gang bcwa gde dag sa
209a3: 'khor 'di la brjod par bya'o nya padas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje la bka' phul pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag yongs klu'i rgyal po sog pa med kyi gnas sugasang sngags kyi cig gang dag smras pa de dag dang / byang chub kyi
209a4: chog dam par 'dug nas/ 'gro ba la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir ngas sems kyis dran pas gang dag smras pa/ de dag khyod kyis dran nas// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dran lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// gas ba pa'i bdag po
209a5: gsang sngags kyi tshig dad/ dpyod spobs par gyis shi ka/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stan la si langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cog tsog por 'dug nas/ lag pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gdugs te gsang sngags
209a6: ge 'di sra so/ / 'dig ste/ a hul/ rgal ba te/ dul raN/ a graH/ tsams tsatsa/ nib+ha dang / k+Shata/ shUta/ ThA ya/ tA ya/ aSh+Ta las sa gas ne kar/ hasral ba ti// zi la ba ti/ kin a b+hi Shi ti/ nis sa te/ dze dzAHdz+nyAH
209a7: a TA ni DA/ bar+ha/ a nus ri Ni/ b+hu ta Ta a du smai o// ma nu Sha a nu/ smi ti ho// de ba a nu pI ti ho// nA gA nAM/ yak+Sha raM/ gan d+harba NAM/ kin na ra nA ma/ ma ho nAM/ swasti b+ha ban tu/ sarba sadatA nAM ba~M ki ran tu ma hA ba ra ba ta/ saM bya thaSh+Ta
209a8: d+har Ni/ gardza dus mu ba beg i ti// gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i gnas thams cad rab du g.yos so// sa thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// rgya ma tsho chen po yang rab tu la thugs so// de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i

209b1: 'thor yang 'dar ba pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyin pas gnyis la phyag 'tshal bar thang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams de sa napas gangagagis sa yang dang // danamapas
209b2: cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gagags pa'i rnabs lam dag tsam du bar 'ag te/ 'deshed ces gsasas+ho// mam ldan das pa ga yang dragasas// bad pa gshegs pa bdag cag 'dugasas/
209b3: bdag cag la gnod lags so// bdag cag la rab tu gnod lags so// bdag cag 'dang pad pad lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal ba// grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ da bzhin/
209b4: gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi rul ni 'di lta ste/ sa chen po 'di ba tu g.yos pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa dang / khyed kyang nam mkha' la gnas nas rab tu g.yos ba na/
209b5: nod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la ka na rdo'i 'khor gyi khams su ci nas srog chags brgyad khris byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sems can tshad med pa de dag gis bslab pa'i gnas rnams blangs/
209b6: par gyur pa de ltar chos rgya cher bstan to// / 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dgu pa/ de nas gsang ba
209b7: bdag po'i brdo rje'i sdes bcom ldan 'das la rin po che'i drabs mngon par bkab nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad pes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
209b8: byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bcu dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o//

210a1: byang chub pa'i 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcug she na/ khong khro ba med pa'i byams pa chen po dang yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje chen po dang / brtsams pa thams cad gams 'og du chud bar byed pa'i brtson 'grus
210a2: dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon sum du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang / thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mkhas pa dang / dus gsum yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes dang / bden pa mthong ba skur bar bya ba sgrib pa med pa
210a3: dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i lam la 'jug pa ste/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang / ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
210a4: byang chub la mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ / gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu rdo rje'i sdes/ bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam
210a5: gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ ming dang mi sgrog cing / skrag par mi 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid
210a6: thos na/ mi dngang mi skrag cing skrag par mi 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ shes rab kyis bstan pa yin/ ye shes kyis bstan pa yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin/ rgya chen po la mos pa yin/ sgyu ma dang
210a7: mtshungs pa'i chos la nges par 'byung ba yin/ chos la mi rtag par mas pa yin/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin/ chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa yin te/ gnonan
210a8: byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyis chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid thos na/ mi ngang mi sreg cing skrag par mi 'gyur ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du

210b1: dang u0f89u0fa4dan/ bgyipa thams cad la dbang dang ldan par byung pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzho kyang napa sems dpa' chos pa'idang ldanan/ byab thams cad la dab nga
210b2: ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhig she na/ legs par bsgoms shing / nyams par mgur pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i gros yongs su bsgos pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa yin
210b3: tshangs pa'i bla ma 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ thams cad kyi rjes su rnam par rgyu ba'i babs dang shes rab las nges par byung ba yin te/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag
210b4: dang ldanan thams cad la dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo du mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
210b5: bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa ye shes kyi sgo dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes rab kyi sgo dang / skad thams cad kun tu 'dzin pa la 'jug pa gzungs kyi sgo dang / chos mi zad pa bstan pa
210b6: so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo ste/ gzhon nu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs du mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
210b7: gzhon byung chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs ni dbuste/ dgug she na/ zhing rje bar bya ba'i phyir nges par sems pa'i stobs dang / phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shes rab chen por bya
210b8: pa'i phyir thos pa'i stobs dang / rnam par grol ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa'i stobs dang / 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i stobs dang / sems can bsrung ba'i phyir bzod pa'i stobs dang

211a1: dud tshar gcad pa'i phying byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i stobs dang / stobs pangs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ma skye bar bzod pa'i stobs te/ gnon nu
211a2: dgu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs so/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po'i bu de dag ma skye'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dag bzod pa thob nas bcom ldan
211a3: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gas ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas su yun ring du gnas shing spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du grag par
211a4: 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing / ci nas kyang nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brla ba du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
211a5: gsang ba ba'i bdag po'i bu de dag gis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring duganas par bya ba dang / badrang
211a6: ngadang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod par bya'i byingangs khyod la bskul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa bsrung ba dang // bdud kyi sde 'ongs pa na bdud tshar
211a7: gcod pa'i phyir khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag bsams shing brjod pa dang / kha ton byas pa'i de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis phul bar
211a8: rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi tshig

211b1: 'di dag smras so/ / taHthA/ hu lu hu lu/ hu le d+hi re/ hA re ti/ a ku sha la k+Sha ye/ tsa le tsa la ba ti/ sa re/ kA re k+Shan ti ba le/ k+She me/ shan ti ka re/ k+Sha me/ sha me dA y+ra/ i li khaM khi Sha ra/ a be sha na
211b2: sadaH/ dza ya dza ya ba te/ s+phar/ a badzin/ be+e he/ a brta ni/ mi the nu canan/ sad kr-i ti/ dmed/ dmas sa banane/ d+har NeShA la ses yan/ swa ti be d+d+ho/ nAg ts+tsha/
211b3: yak+Sha b+h+yo// gan d+ha rbe b+h+yo// rak+Sha se b+h+yo// ma nu She b+h+yo// a ma nu She b+h+yo// sra stir b+ha ba tu satwa su khum// gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas// ri'i rgyal po rnams kyang g.yos// sa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/
211b4: chu yo rgyal po rnams kyang 'khrugs// gsang sngags 'di dag rabarjod pas// bas kyi rgol rnams tshar yang gcod// chos smra ba ni yang dag bsdus chos kyi mdzod ni kun tu bsrungs// gsang sngags gzhi 'di thos nas ni//
211b5: lha tshogs kun du dag 'gyur nas// dam chos ring du gnas 'gyur zhes// phan tshun du ni smra bar byed// stong gsum po yang rab tu g.yos// 'khor yang rab tu 'dar gyur nas// mi'i dbang po'i zhabs gnyis la// gtug pa byas te skyabs su
211b6: song / / de dag mi 'jigs der byin nas// ston pas 'di dag bka' stsal te// mdo 'di byin gyis brlabs pas na// dam chos ring du gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas su zhag
211b7: bdun 'das 'das su sems can tshad med pa dag gi don mdzad nas zhag bdun 'das te/ lcang lo can gyi po brang 'khor du sems can gyi don mdzad pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyas par mdzad nas// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas nam
211b8: gshegs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam de nyid nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du ba dang / lha'i tshogs kyis ni phyag byas/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod gnod

212a1: sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding du mas ning do// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni ngon par bstod// 'od gzer gyi dra ba ni rab tu 'gyed/ rol mos li snyan ni
212a2: len/ me tog gi char ni 'bebs/ zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar mdad cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sangs rgya
212a3: cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa
212a4: med par gshegs te/ slar bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la byon to// gas rab pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhas meng du 'brang bar 'gyur to// bzhud pa dang byon pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu pa'o//
212a5: de na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyen red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog
212a6: las bzhengs nas chos ston to/ / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags drug khri dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs par rig nas/ phye ma red
212a7: dus kyi tshe me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rigal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
212a8: 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag

212b1: bdin bdud lang na mchis mchis na/ gzhon nu 'jigs byang sbyin mchis te/ 'di skad ces mchi'o// yababacom ldan 'das ni gas ba pa'i bdag po la gar rdo rje'i gnas lung lo can gyi po brang 'khor dugadugs cho
212b2: gsol nas slar gshegs zhes gda'o zhes mchis nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis 'di skam du bsam te/ gang gi slad du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du/
212b3: bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs na yang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi 'khor du gshegs pas 'di ltar gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gtad pa'i sems can de ni
212b4: sems can gyi ris na gang yang ma mchis te/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnam par nges pa
212b5: lung bstan pa lung ston pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid chen po ni ngo mtshar to snyam bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das gsar ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
212b6: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdzin ci la dge pa'i chu ba bskyedan/ des 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thul po da
212b7: pa sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams kyis ni/ gnas 'di la mos par dka' ste/ 'on gyi kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur ba de dag ni mos par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
212b8: klung gi bye ba snying po de dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa'i/ sangs rgyas bcom 'das de dag ni

213a1: bzang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de dag gi gan nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pas/ des na spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di/
213a2: ltar rig par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba'i 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa rgya che ba'i yang ches rgya cheg/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa'i de'i tshe/ de'i dus na
213a3: masmad ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa 'jig gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'dzi/
213a4: rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i// kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par zhi spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gzhe
213a5: ba rnam par zhi spyod de/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis lus dang / srog kyang btang te/ brtson 'grus brtsams par bya'o// zhes byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' shig yang dag par ston to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe
213a6: byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/ / 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus dang / srog kyang
213a7: btong ste/ brtson 'grus brtsams par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i/ don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
213a8: 'di snyam du myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ / snyam du sems dpa'/ de ni le lo can du zags pa lags pa snyam bdag bgyid do// de ci'i

213b1: slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams nas ba yongs su ga pa'i tho ga bar mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can/
213b2: yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du la khor ba la ban yon du lta ba lags kyi/ mya ngan las 'das pa pan da ma ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang chub semasapa 'a nas rnasems can gyi don pa btsun pa lags so// de ci'i slad dran na/ btsam
213b3: ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bcan 'grus la mas pa rnams la 'ayong ba nims pada'o/ / mya ngan las 'das bal ni da snya ma lags so// de ci'i slang byizhe na/ bcom ldan das thangag pa sems dpa' sems can gyi ro la
213b4: brtson pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dod ba gyed pa de lta de ltar bde bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/ slad kyis ci zhig bgyi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags// sa byang chub sems
213b5: dpas 'khor ba'i bde ba'i ro mi myang bar 'khor ba'i spyod yul du gyis te/ mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du mi 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i bde ba'i rol mi byang bar 'khor ba spyod yul du bgyid cing / sems
213b6: can gyi don la brtson pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldand das tshad ma mchis pa mthong bar 'gyur// tshes tshad ma mchis pa nyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can tshad ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
213b7: sems dpa' 'khor ba la spyod yul du bgyid pa ni/ sems can gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'jug go/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa spyod yul du bgyid pa ni gtang snyoms su lhung lags so// bcom ldan
213b8: 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i spyod yul gyis skrag nas/ spyod yul ma lags par ltung ste/ slad kyis sems can gyi don mi bgyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing

214a1: sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur lags so/ / de'i spyod yul ma lags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'tshal zhing sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la g.yel ba lags
214a2: so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul gang lags pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
214a3: ni 'khor bas skrag pa'i spyod yul ba lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor ba'i dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul la gnas par
214a4: bgyi'o/ / rgyal ba chen ba dend ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par ni spyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes pa'adi skad ces bka' stsal to/ khyis tha dam pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa le /
214a5: so legs so// byang chub sems dpas rang gi spyod yul gyi bya ba dag la gus par byas te/ rang gi spyod yul la spyad par bya'i gzhan gyi spyod yul la spyad par mi bya'o gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
214a6: rnams kyis rang gi spyod yul gang lags/ / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin pas mi skrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spong
214a7: pa'i phan yon dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'dod pa med pa dang / nying mtshams sbyor ba med par yang / shes la khams gsum du yang mtshams sbyor ba dang / sel ba dang / sdud pa dang / dge ra
214a8: rtsa ba rnams spel ba dang / tshul la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba shes pa dang / dge ba thams cad sogs pa la mkhas pa dang / zad pa yang shes la bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa la yang mkhas pa dang / skye ba med pa

214b1: yang rab tu rtog la bsams bzhin du skye ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sems can yang med la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang / chos thams cad dben par yang shes la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su
214b2: gzung ba la yang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi sku yin par
214b3: yang shes la/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan rnam par sgrub pa yongs su tshol ba la yang mkhas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang shes la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba'i rgyur
214b4: mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos kyang yongs su sbyong la don nyung zhing bya ba/ nyung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ci bya'o cog la yang mkhas la/ lus dang sems dben par dga' ba yang shes
214b5: pa dang / chos bstan pa yang mi 'dor la/ smra ba la spyod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / bsam gtan yang skyed la/ bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar yang mi byed pa dang / chos zab mo rtogs pa yang shes la/ sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su
214b6: yang 'jug cing gtam yang dag par ston pa la yang mkhas pa dang / 'byung ba med par yang shes la/ bsams bzhin du srid pa yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / lhag mthong yang shes la/ 'bras bu thob par mi byed pa la yang mkhas pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang
214b7: sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yin la de bzhin gsheg pa'i rnam par grol ba 'dod pa'i rgyu mi gcod pa la yang mkhas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'dor ba yang shes la/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la lta ba la yang mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni
214b8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul lo/ / rgyal po chen po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par ni spyod las spyod yul yongs su dag pa bstan pa

215a1: 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yongs su dag pa
215a2: bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtsho lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'chal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i rang gi spyod yul
215a3: ni chos thams cad legs pa snyam bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na gnas lags pa dang / gzugs snang ba thams cad la mi sgrib pa dang / nam mkha'i spyod yul sgrib pa ma mchis pas gzugs
215a4: su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ni chos thams cad lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di//
215a5: sde dper bgyin/ gnod param mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugs su gda' ba thams cad ni nam mkha'i spyod yul lags te/ dug gi shing ljon pa'am/ sman gyi shing ljon pa 'am/ tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa'am/ me tog gi shing ljon pa 'am/
215a6: 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa'am/ spos kyi shing ldan pa gang lags par dag thams cad ni nam mkha' las rnam par 'phel yang nam mkha' ni de dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur/ rjes su chags
215a7: bar yang la 'gyur/ bang tho bar yang me 'byar lags sa// gamalan 'das de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa shes dpa las das par byung ba'i rang gi srung mAl ni chas thams cad lags te/ mas skye bo
215a8: chos gang dag legs pa dang / slob pa'i chos dang / mi slob pa'i chos dang / rang songs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang dag legs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang dag lags pa rnams so//

215b1: de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni nges mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na zhugs ni rtswa 'am/ nags tshol gang yang nu ste/ de las ma
215b2: 'bros kyi de dag thams cad ni me smon gsal bar 'bar bar bgyid pas phan par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi me sgron 'bar bar 'gyid pas/ chos thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i
215b3: rang gi spyod yul lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyid na chen po che'i lus ni zhugs kyis mi tshig/ mtshon gyis mi khams// dug gis mi khum sa ti/ de pha rol gyi gnod pas mi tshugs so// bcom ldan
215b4: 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyang nyan thos dang / 'dris par bgyid pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'dris par bgyid pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang 'dris par bgyid pas zhi bar bgyid mi nus te/ de
215b5: lha ji ltar 'dris par bgyid pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong la brtson pa shes rab gsal bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ nor bu rin po che chab dang bar bgyid pa ni/ rnyog pa thams cad dang bar bgyid do//
215b6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi rin po che yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ sman gyi rigs 'bral byed ces bgyi ba de ni
215b7: dug dang lhan gcig tu yang mi gnas la dug thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa yang sems can gyi nyon mongs pa 'am/ rang gi
215b8: nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na/ chos thams byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi spyod yul lags so//

216a1: rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs kyis de skad bstan pan/ sog chags brgyad stong gis bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' gis brgya
216a2: nami skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/ / rgyal po chen po 'di snyam du de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa rnam par ni spyod kyi gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' stobs shes bya bar gyur pa ste/ gzhan zhig
216a3: yin pa skam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje 'di nyid/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' stobs shes bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi go cha brtan po
216a4: 'di lta bu bgos so/ / de ltar sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas so// / dpa' stobs kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'disam du sems te/ gsang ba pa'i
216a5: bdag pa lagan rdorje'i lag pa g.yas pa na ji rdzogs pa/ deci khri ba nigag pa/ 'on te yang ba ni// gang gi phyir na gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sa rdo rje 'di stobs kyi shugs chen po bdag po zhes byasnyam po// de nas gas ba pa'i bdas pa/
216a6: sa rgyal pam skyes dbyasams ston pa par dag pasems kyigs nas/ rgyal po ma skyes thal 'dam ces snyams// rtswa bachen pa gyu rdzob pa yini sa yang pa yang yin// snyam bco byis/ rmib mi
216a7: na ra yang / sbrum pa ma yin pa sams can rgyal dang / rnags pa dang / dregs pas rnams pa las seMsas ga 'i phyi na/ sems can ma med pa rgyu rnams pan ya bzhin// denas
216a8: gsang baba'i bdag po la ga darjes sa phyogs dordo rje byi kyis rlabs nas rjon sa'i steng du banag pa dang / de bgam tha du stong gsung kyi stong na po 'jig rten gyi bams rnam padru du bdug mom so// dedes gsang papa'i bdag po lag

216b1: dardorjes rgyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig/ de nas rgyal po pa skyes dgras chen po chen po'i stobs kyis shugs chen po dang ldan pas/ rdo rje stobs kyi/
216b2: shugs thams cad kyis 'deg par bskyod na/ skra'i rtse mo tsam yang bskyod pa'am/ bskul bar ma nus nas/ de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcod ldan 'das
216b3: bdag ni chen po chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan te/ go cha dang / yalang bskon pa'i glang po che yang lag pa yag cig gis bdeg pa'i rdo zlog na bdag gis rdorje 'di ltar rung ba 'di bskyod pa'am/ bskul ba'i rdo yang mthog pa/
216b4: bdeg par lha mos kyang ci 'tshal te/ 'di la rgyu ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'di ni lci yis/ 'di la khyod yi ma 'chad cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras lha'i dbang po brgya byin pa
216b5: 'di skad ces smras so/ / ko'u shi ka khyod rdo rje 'chang ba zhes bya na rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rang gi stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / stobs kyi shugs thams cad
216b6: kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa'am/ bskul bar ma nus so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin ngo mtshar du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi tshe lha ma yin dang g.yul 'gyed pa de'itshe
216b7: lag pa g.yas pas lha ma yin gyi dbang po zag zangs ris kyi shing rta dpag tshad bdud brgya pa drag du mchi ba yang 'dzin pa'i rngo thog na/ bdag gis rdo rje chung ngu 'di bskyod pa'am/ bskul ba'i rngo ma thog pa 'di/ bcod ldan 'das
216b8: ci lags/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rdo rje 'di ni lci ste/ 'di la nga'i byin gyi rlabs ma yin par rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du

217a1: du sems/ ri'i rgyal po re rab lci ba yin nam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ri'i rgyal po ri rab ci tsam du lci ba de ni dpe'i brtsi bar yang sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ga /
217a2: ka rdo rje 'di ni wi ste/ ko'u shi ka gal te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdorje rdo nga bzhi kyis khor yug gi ril bsnun na/ de yang dper na/ phung na spang gang gtor ba bzhin du rnam par 'thor te/ ko'u shi ka rdo rje 'ang
217a3: stobs kyi shugs kyi ni de tsam mo/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad smras so// btsun pa myed la gyiza chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang
217a4: ldan pa'i mchog du bstan pa yin na/ rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg sheg/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di snyam du bsams te/ gal te bdag gis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di'i mdun du rdo rje 'di
217a5: gdeg par ma nus na ni bdag la dbang za bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des de 'dra ba'i stobs kyi shugs kyis rdo rje de bzung ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos te/
217a6: ru yang gnam du rgal cing rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrugs kyang rdo rje de bskyod pa 'am/ bskal bar ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
217a7: nam pa di 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyis nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar rdzu 'phrul cheni de dang da che
217a8: bang grags la/ de ltar mthu che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gang gi tshe 'tshal na/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chab kyi phung po lag mthil gcig tu 'jog go// bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

217b1: gyikhams 'di yang dadam bgyin/ pil la zhig gis kar Sha ba Na ga cig 'dzub mo'i rtse mos bsgre bzlog pa de bzhin du bdag gis bak+She sa// bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chen po ma
217b2: pa yang bdag gis thogs par bgyid do/ / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang lag pa ya gcig gis blangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bod
217b3: gnyis kyang btul to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du yang mchis// bdag gis ri rab tsam gyi khams de dag kyang 'tshal 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rdo rje 'di ltar chung ba 'di bskyod pa
217b4: 'am/ bskul ba'i rdo yang ma thog pa 'di bcom ldan 'das bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa 'am/ gcig tu ma 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po
217b5: khyod rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de las yongs su nyams pa ni med mod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs 'di nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rnam par bkrug par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan dag gis
217b6: lha smos kyang ci dgos/ / mo'u dgal gyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab yod pa rnams ni bskyod pa'am/ bskul bar nus kyi/ rdo rje 'di ni sa phyogs 'di nas bskyod pa'am/ bskul bar mi nus so//
217b7: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bas gas ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni stobs che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten
217b8: gyi khams ni ri rab ji snyed yod pa de dag ri gcig tu gyur kyang do ni gdage bar rus kyi rdo rje 'di ni gdeg par mi nus so/ / de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'chang bsags

218a1: pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje 'di ni stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan pa lags te ngo tshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gas rab pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i stobs de pa ma las gyur pa
218a2: lags sam 'on te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs lags tsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / mo'u dgal gyi bu pa ma las gyur pa'i stobs de ni gang ci yang rungadwa ste/ 'jug pa tsam du ming bstan par zad do// gal te byang chub
218a3: sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de ma lus par bstan na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mye myo por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lha stangs kyis phyogs thams cad du kun tu gzigs te/ gas ba pa'i/
218a4: bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod kyis rdo rje 'di sa'i steng 'di nas theg shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos
218a5: bar byas nas/ sa'i steng de nas rdo rje de lag pa g.yon pas blangs ste/ steng gi bar snad du 'phangs nas des de bar snang la lan bdun bskor te/ lag pa g.yas par gzhag go// de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ro mtshar bu gyur te/ thal mo
218a6: sbyar nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'di 'char bsags rab pa'i bdag pa lag na rdo rje ci ma du stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di la
218a7: bu'i sabs dang ldan par 'gyur cig ces smras so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma ses dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chom du dang ldanan slobs 'di lta bu'i theb/ bcom ldan 'das
218a8: kyis bka'astsal ba/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldanan stobs 'di ga du 'ab to// bcug da zhen rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang / srog ni yongs su gtong gi/ dam pa'i chos ni

218b1: yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la 'dud cing nga rgyal nga ba kyi da/ sems can mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing khong khro bar mi byed pa dang / sems can bkres pa rnams la kha zas bzang po mchog
218b2: sbyin pa dang / sems cad 'jig pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la yang dag pa'i gsob bya bar spro ba dang / sems can dbul po rnams la longs spyong dag gis tshim par byed pa dang / de yin
218b3: gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rdo thal gyis skud pa dang sems can rnams la kun tu dga' bar gyur pa'i cho ga sgrogs pa dang / sems can dbul po sdug bsngal ba dal bachad pa rnams kyi khur khyer ba ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems
218b4: dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ stobs 'di lta bu 'thob bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa lags shing / cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba lags// bcom ldan
218b5: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/ cang shes par 'gyur zhing / cang shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dga' blo bde ba dang / dran pa dang / mnyen
218b6: ba dang / nges pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / bran dog med pa dang / sems las su rung ba ste/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ cang shes par 'gyur zhing
218b7: cad shes pa'i 'gro bar 'gro'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis cang shes kyi 'gro ba du zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang
218b8: shes kyi 'gro ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang gi tshe mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa de'itshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byir du 'gyur te/

219a1: der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / khyim bdag tshong dpon du 'gyur te/ der yang sangs rgyas byung
219a2: pamanyes par byed pa ste/ dral po chen po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi cang shes kyi 'gro 'o// rgyal pos skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dad pa'i rgyu 'thun bci lags// bcom ldan 'das/
219a3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dad pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sbyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni longs spyod do//
219a4: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags// bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni shes rab po// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags// bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po tshul
219a5: khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa ni bde 'gro thams cad du khrob 'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bzod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni sems can rjes su srung ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom
219a6: ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ / bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po brtson 'grus kyi rgyu 'thun pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi rgyu 'thun
219a7: pa ci lags/ / bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bsam gtan gyi rgyu 'thun pa ni nye bar zhi ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa ni nyon mongs
219a8: pa thams cad sel ba'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po chos nyan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni the tsom thong pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos yongs su

219b1: 'dri ba'i na 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal ba chen pa chos yongs su 'dri ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ni soma'i med pado// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dben par gnas pa'i rgyu thun pa ci lags/ bkar byul pa/ rnam/
219b2: po chen po dben par gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni/ bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa 'thab pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsgom pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bsgom pa'
219b3: 'thun pa ni 'bral ba'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po mi rtag pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa 'dor ba'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan
219b4: 'das sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sdug bsngal thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni nye bar len pa med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal/
219b5: pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag med pa thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa 'gog pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhi ba zos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ni ba thos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni
219b6: ba shi ba'o/ / gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba'o// gsol pa/
219b7: bcom ldan 'das lus dang / sems dben pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lus dang sems dben pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ni/ bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa skye ba'o// gsol pa/ bcom
219b8: ldan 'das lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa ni 'bras bu mngon par rtogs pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mos pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ci lags/ bka' stsal ba rgyal po chen po mos//
