284a4: pa'i sngon du ni 'gro/ / stong pa nyid dang mtsham ma med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i gnas pas ni gnas te/ nga rgyal med cing ngag legs par bsrungs par gyur te/
284a5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ des ngag gi las 'byung ba gang bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga la gnod par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu spangs nas/ ngag gi las bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga la phan par 'gyur
284a6: bde la brtson par gyur te/ de ltar shes bzhin can du gyur cing / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'jug pa na/ nam yang gzugs dang / sgra dang dri
284a7: dang re dang / reg bya dang / chos la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med par gyur to// de byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan yang de nyid yang
284a8: dag par 'dzin du bcug go/ bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan yang de nyid yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/

284b1: gang ga dang ldan na gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der/ gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma sa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsgrubs par gyur to// de byang chub sems dpa'i
284b2: spyad pa spyod par/ sems ca bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med/ dpag tu med pa gang dgang gage las kyis mthar phyin par slab ma yin pa/ de snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do//
284b3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med/ dpag tu med pa de snyed la/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzams cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis sti stang du
284b4: byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas te/ mchod pa byas so// sems can ji snyed rab tu sbyin par byas pa dang / tshong dpon dang khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag la rab tu bkod pa de dag
284b5: kyang tshig gis bstan pas mthar phyin par slab ma yin no/ / de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyu gnyid dang / 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang / 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / rab 'thab bral nyid dang / yongs su dga' ldan nyid dang
284b6: rab 'phral nyid dang / bang sbyar nyid dang / lha'i rgyal po nyid dang / tshangs pa chen po nyid la rab tu bkod do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed la sti stang byas bla mar byas/ rim gror byas te mchod nas/
284b7: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir gsol ba btab pa de dag kyang ngag gi las kyis bstan pas mthar phyin par slab ma yin no// de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
284b8: dpag tu med grangs med/ khasam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med tshad med brjod du mer bar kha nas lha'i las shin tu 'das pa'i tsan dan gyi dri rab tu zhim pa'i bsung 'byung ba dang / skra'i khung bu thams cad nas me

285a1: tog ud pa la'i bsung 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad na gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dang / mtshan dang de ba byad bzang pos lus legs par
285a2: brgyan pa dang / de'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang / gos dang chos gos mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang / me tog dang spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'breng ba dang byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang bdan mngon par
285a3: bsgrub pa thams cad dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs dang / glu dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu thams cad dang / lag pa gnyis nas 'byung ba dang / zas dang skom dang / bza' bo dang bca' ba dang / bldag pa
285a4: dang / ro thob mngon par rab sgrub pa thams cad dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad kyang lag pa gnyis nas zag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba yang dag parab skabs so
285a5: kun dga' bo de ltar dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ yo byad thabs cad la dbang ba'i pha rol tu son par gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das le tsha dang
285a6: ldan papa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'byung gnas de/ bra na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
285a7: rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das legs sa pa/ 'on to mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ya sug 'das mi na gyu dgas dzag yang sangs rgyas te/ dkar na bzhugs la/
285a8: 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ chos kyang ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yinas 'ongs pa yang ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de blan med

285b1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de lta na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
285b2: na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dod pag med ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med bdag dang / nye
285b3: thos mtha' yas bdag gis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan no// de'i 'od ni dpag tu med de/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di snyed cig dang /
285b4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 'di snyed cig dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag 'di snyed cig dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba ba
285b5: phrag 'di snyed cig dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig khyab par byas te/ 'dug go/
285b6: zhes mtha'i tshad rtogs par slab ma yin no// kun dga' ba 'on kyang mdor bstan ma/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'od pag
285b7: med de'i 'od kyis rtag tu khyab bo/ / de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang steng dang / phyogs mtshams kyi phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ bcom ldan
285b8: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis rtag tu khya ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyis byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'do mdo pa dang / gsum par de/

286a1: bzhi pa dang / lA ba dang / bcu pa dang / ti shu pa dang / sram ban pa dang / ban rba ba dang / lnga bcu pa dang / 'dod dpag gyus/ 'did pag da brgyab dang / 'dod ga cad kyang pa dang // du
286a2: brgya stong pa nas/ dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par gyur te/ gnas pa ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo dpa gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
286a3: pa'od dpag med de'i 'od kyi tshod gzung ba'i dpe gzhag pa med de/ kun dga' bo rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'od dpag med ces bya ba ste/ 'od dpa med pa dang / sdang ba dpag tu med pa dang / 'od
286a4: thug pa med pa dang / 'od chags pa med pa dang / 'od thogs pa med pa dang / 'od rtag tu gtong ba dang / lha'i nor bu'i 'od dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od gzer gyi rgyal po'i 'od dang / chags par 'gyur ba'i 'od dang /
286a5: dga' bar 'gyur ba'i 'od dang / mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i 'od dang / tshim par 'gyur ba'i 'od dang / lta bar 'gyur ba'i 'od dang / 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i 'od dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od dang / mtshungs pa
286a6: med pa'i 'od dang / mi'i dbang po dang / lha'i dbang po zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od dang / nyi ma dang zla ba zil gyis gnon cing mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang / 'jig rten skyong pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / gnas
286a7: gtsang ma pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang / mdor bsdu na 'od thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i 'od de ni dri ma med pa/ shin tu rgyas pa/ lus
286a8: la bde bskyed pa/ sems dga' bar byed pa/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang nam mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi'am ci dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang /

286b1: bde bskyed pa/ sems can dge ba'i bsam pa can rnams la/ dge ba dang yang ba dang / rtogs pa dang / mkhas pa dang / blo dang mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o// kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan mtha'
286b2: yas mu med pa dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gang ste/ bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan gyi las chur byas pa dang / 'od phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams te brjod kyang mtshan bstan pa dang
286b3: 'od phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i
286b4: 'od kyi yon tan 'byor pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang / spobs pa bla na med pa dang / de gnyi ga dang yang grangs med dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab la mu med pa'i phyir ngo // kun dga' bo de bzhin gshes
286b5: pa 'od dpag med de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med de/ nyan thos bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ nyan thos bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am nyan thos bye ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ nyan thos bye ba brgya stong
286b6: phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ gtams phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ dkrigs phrag 'di snyed cig ca 'am/ khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed cig tse mthe 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig ce ma mi 'khrugs pa phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ rnam
286b7: 'dreg phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ rgyun 'thab phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ rgyal ba phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ dpag tu med pa phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ grangs med pa phrag 'di skad cig ce'am/ bgrang du med pa dran
286b8: 'di snyed cig ce'am/ mtshungs pa med pa phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa phrag 'di snyed cig ces/ de'i tshad gzung bar slab ma yin no// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu chen

287a1: bo rdzu 'phrul la dbang thob pa de 'dod na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyin zhagagagi gis 'grang ba de lta bu'i rnam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan
287a2: pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yod par gyur la/ de dag las gzhan yang mi byed par lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang po 'dus pa/ bgrangs kyang de dag gis brgya'i char yang
287a3: bgrangs par mi 'gyur te/ stong dang brgya stong dang / cha dang pe dang / chu'i bar du yang bgrangs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgya khri bzhi stong yod pa/ khyon
287a4: dpag du med pa la mi la la zhig gis skra tshal ba brgyad gshegs pa'i rtse mos nu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang skra 'tshal ba brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos nu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa
287a5: dang / gang rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po phyin lus pa de gnyis gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tshad stong yang rgya mtsho chen po bas nyung lags na/ skra tshal ba brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mos cha bi thigs pa cig
287a6: blangs pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// kun dga' bo chu thigs pa gcig lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang por 'dus pa la/ mo'u dgal
287a7: gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong rnams kyis lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bgrangs te/ 'di snyed gcig go zhes grangs kyis chod pa lta bu yin no// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po phyin lus pa lta bu'i grangs kyis mchod par blta ba yin
287a8: na/ nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni de ltar mtha' yas mu med de/ de ni dpag tu med do zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no//

287b1: kun dga' ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od sag mad da' cha'achad kyang ga tu me dang / bskal pa'ad sad cig ca'am/ bskal ba brgya phrag 'das cig tsa'am/ bskal pa snang phrag 'di srung /
287b2: ce'am/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ bskal pa bye ba stong phrag 'di skad cig ca'am/ bskal ba bye ba baH
287b3: stong phrag 'di snyed cig ces bya ba nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di skad cig go zhes bya ba'i bar du de'i tshe'i tshid rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med/
287b4: de'i sku tshe'i tshad de ltar dpag tu med de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od dpag med ces bya'o// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
287b5: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ji ltar da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bskal pa'i grangs dang / bskal pa bgrang ba'i brdar brtags pa de lta bu bskal pa bcu lon no// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag
287b6: med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba ni 'byor pa dang / mod pa/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/ lha dang mi mang pos gang ba'o// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can dmyal ba med do// dud
287b7: 'gro'i skye gnas med do/ / yi dgas kyi yul med do// lha ma yin gyi ris med do// mi khom par skye ba med do// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na snang ba'i rin po che gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten na mi spyod do// kun dga' bo
287b8: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de ni spos sna tshogs dri rab tu zhim pa'i ngad ldang ba'o/ / me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs 'byor pa'o// rin po che'i shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas sprul

288a1: ba'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra yid du 'ong bcan gyi tshogs kyis bstan pa'o/ / kun dga' bo rin po che'i shing ljon pa de dag ni kha dog tha dad pal dog drum pa/ kha dog brgya stong phrag dum yod pa'o// kun
288a2: dga' bo de ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / gser gyi rang bzhin can dag yod do// dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin dag yod // bai dUr+ya'i kha dog lta bu dang / bai dUr+ya'i
288a3: rang bzhin dag yod do/ / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang / shel gyi rang bzhin dag yod do// sdug gi kha dog lta bu dang / spug gi rang bzhin ngag yod do// mu tig dmar po'i kha dog lta bu dang / mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin
288a4: dag yod do/ / rdo'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu dang / rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin dag yod do// kha cig ni gser dang dngul dang rin po che sna gnyis pa dag yod do// gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang / rin po che sna gsum pa dag kyang yod do// gser dang dngul dang
288a5: bai dUr+ya dang shel dang rin po che sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod do/ / gser dang dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shal dang spug dang / rin po che sna lnga pa dag kyang yod do// gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang /
288a6: rin po che sna drug pa dag kyang yod do// gser dang dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin pa che sna bdun pa dag kyang yod do// kun dga' bo de na gser gyi shing ljon pa
288a7: rnams kyi rtse ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams gser gyi rang bzhin la/ rtsa ba rnams dngul kyi rang bzhin no// dngul gyi zhing ldan pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal
288a8: ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin no// bai dUr+ya'i shing ldan pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang /

288b1: me tog rnams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams shel gyi rang bzhin no// shel gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams shel gyi rang
288b2: bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams sdug gi rang bzhin no// spug gi shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams spug gi rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu
288b3: rnams mu tig dmang po'i rang bzhin no/ / mu tig dmar po'i shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin la// 'bras bu rnams
288b4: rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin no/ / rdo'i snying po'i shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams gser gyi rang bzhin no//
288b5: kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa rnams gser gyi rang bzhin la sdong po rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams spug gi rang bzhin
288b6: me tog rnams mu ti ge dmar po'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig zhi rtsa ba rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams/
288b7: shel gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams spug gi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ me tog rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams gser gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig
288b8: ni rtsa ba rnams bai dUr+ya'i rar bzhin la/ sdong po rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams spug gi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin// 'dab ma rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ me tog rnams gser

289a1: gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams shel gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams smug gi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams mu tig dmar po'i
289a2: rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams gser gyi rang bzhin// me tog rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams
289a3: spug gi rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin// me tog rnams bai DUr+ya'i rang
289a4: bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams shel gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig/ rtsa ba rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ sdong po rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams gser gyi rang bzhin
289a5: lo ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin/ me tog rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams spug gi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams rdo'i snying po'i
289a6: rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ me tog rnams spug gi rang bzhin// 'bras bu
289a7: rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin no/ / kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin la// sdong po rnams kyang rin po chesna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ yul ga rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun
289a8: kyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams kyang rin pa ca sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams kyang rin po casna bdun kyirang bzhin/ me tog rnams kyang rin po na sna bdun kyi rang bzhin/ 'bras thurnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi

289b1: bzhon no/ / kun dga' bo shing ljon pa de dag thams cad rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams ni 'jam pa/ reg na bde badri zhim bdag go// rlung gis bskyod
289b2: nade dag las snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ mnyan pa dang 'thun zhing mnyan pas chog mi shes pa'o// kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis gang
289b3: ste/ mtha' ni rin po che sna bdun gyi chu shing gi sdong po dang / rin po che'i shing ta la'i 'phreng gis yongs su bskor to// thams cad kyang gser gyi dra pas khebs pa'o// kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma rnams kyis
289b4: khebs pa'o/ / de na pad ma'i tshad dpag tshad phyed tsam yang yod// dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yang yod/ dpag tshad gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga'i tshad tsam yang yod de/ dpag tshad bcu'i bar gyi tshad tsam
289b5: dag kyang yod do/ / rin po che'i pad ma thams cad las kyang 'od zer bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ngo // 'od zer gyi rtse mo thams cad las kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gser gyi kha dog can/ skyes bu
289b6: chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ bye ba stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug drug 'byung ste/ de dag shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thad da grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs nas sems can
289b7: rnams la chos ston to/ / de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs dang / 'og dang stong dang / phyogs mtshams rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs nas sems can rnams
289b8: la chos ston to/ / kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ri nag po rnams ye med do// ri thams cad kyang rin po che'i ri sha stag go/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad dang / khor yug dang / ra'i rgyal po khor yug

290a1: chen po thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kun du mnyam pa nyams dga' ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ sa phyogs rin po che rnam pa sna chog/
290a2: kyis spangs pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha ri rab kyi ngos la gnas pa dang / sum cu rtsa
290a3: gsum pa'i lha ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa de dag gang na gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di ni de'i rgyal po ri rab kyi gong ma yang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang / dga' ldan dang /
290a4: 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen nas/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams gang na gnas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las mngon
290a5: par 'du bgyid pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / las mngon par 'du byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rnyed par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
290a6: 'das rnams kyi dge ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sus kyang mtha' 'am/ tshad rtogs pa 'am/ bsam par mi nus te/ gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po//
290a7: zhes rab tu 'byed de// de ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / 'byor pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas kyi
290a8: zhing der 'byung ngo / / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de la 'dogs pa 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom ma mchis te/ bdag ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dogs pa 'am/ yid gnyis dang / the tsom bsal

290b1: ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo legaso legs so// de lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
290b2: can de ra/ chu klung rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bab ste/ de na chu klung chen po kha tshon dpag tshad tsam dag kyang yod/ dpag tshad bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum ru dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'i par dang / kha tshon dpag tshad brgya stong gi
290b3: tshad tsam dag kyang yod de/ zabs su ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa dag yod do// chu klung de dag thams cad kyang spos dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyi chur 'bab cing / rin po che'i me tog sil mo'i tshogs dang 'bab pa dag go/
290b4: sgra dbyangs snyan pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang yang ldan pa dag go// kun dga' bo chu klung chen po de dag las/ lha'i glu dbyangs yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa'i sil snyan dag mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa bas/ lhag pa'i sgra yid
290b5: du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ chu klung chen po de dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ba ni zab pa dang / kun shes par bya ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par bde ba dang / snying du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / skar
290b6: pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / mnyan par chog mi shes pa dang / mnyan pa dang 'thun pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / mnyan na bde ba ste// de dag sems can de dag gi rna ba'i dbang po la grag go// kun dga' bo chu klung chen po
290b7: de dag gi 'gram gnyis ni rin po che spos kyi shing ljon pa dag gis gang ste/ de dag la yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / dog pa sna tshogs 'phyad do// de na sems can gang dag chu klung gi 'gram de dag tu/ zang zing med pa lha'i
290b8: dga' ba dang / rtsa ba myong bar 'dod pa de dag chu klung de dag tu 'jug pa'i tshe 'dod na/ chu long bu nub tsam du gnas so// 'dod na pus mo nub tsam dang / 'dod na rked pa nub tsam dang / 'dod na mchan khung nub tsam dang

291a1: 'dod na med pa nub tsam du chu gnas par gyur te/ lha'i dga' ba dag kyang 'byung ngo // deng sems can gang dag chu grang bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la bsil bar 'gyur ro// gang dag dro bar gyur
291a2: cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la dro bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dag bsil ba dang dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la chu de bsil ba dang / dro bar gyur te bde bar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po de dag ni lha'i shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang
291a3: a ga ru dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / rgya spos dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / spos mchog gis/ bsgos pa'i tshes yongs su gang ste 'bab pa/ lha'i me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang /
291a4: pad ma dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhim pa dag gi me tog gis khebs pa/ khol khol dag bya dang pa dang / gzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / ka ran da ba dang / ne tse dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ku na la dang / ka la bidi ka
291a5: dang / rma bya la sogs pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i bya'i tshogs kyis bsten pa/ dang pa dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ 'bab stegs bde ba 'dam rdzab med pa/ gser
291a6: kyi bye ma bdal ba dag go/ / de na gang gi tshe sems can de dag bdag cag gi bsam pa 'di 'dra ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig snyam du 'dod pa de'i tshe/ de dag gi bsam pa de lta bu dag chos dang / ldan par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
291a7: ro// kun dga' bo chu de las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa des/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la go bar byed do// de na sems can gang dag chu ngogs na 'khod pa dag sgra 'di bdag cag gi na pa'i da
291a8: la grag par ma gyur cig ces 'dod na/ de dag gi lha'i rna ba'i dbang po la grag par mi 'gyur ro// gang sgra rnam pa ji lta bu thos par 'dod pa de rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra yid du 'ong ba thos so// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sku

291b1: dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / sa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i
291b2: dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi
291b3: sgra dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / dbang bzung ba'i sa rab tu thub pa'i sgra dag thos so// des sgra rnam pa de lta bu
291b4: thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob po// dben pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dod chags dang / bral ba dang ldan pa dang / zhi ba dang ldan pa dang / 'gog pa dang ldan pa dang / tshes dang ldan pa dang / byang chub
291b5: yongs su 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung ngo / / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na mi dge ba'i ming yong su med do// sgrib pa'i sgra yod med do// ngan song ngan 'gro rnam par ltung ba'i sgra yang yod
291b6: med do/ / sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang yod med do// kun dga' bo de na sdug bsngal yang med/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i sgra yang med na/ sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang lhag la yod/ kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na rnam
291b7: grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams da bde ba can zhes bya ste/ rgyas par ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par byas na/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par zad zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu
291b8: yongs su brjod kyang bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gzugs dang / kha dog dang /

292a1: stobs dang / mthu dang / chu zheng dang / dbang dang / bsod nams bsags pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag dang / gos dang rgyan dang skyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa yongs su spyad
292a2: ba rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa rnams de lta bu thams cad dang ldan te/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
292a3: lha rnams dang 'dra'o/ / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi sems can dag kham gyi za ba rags pa'i kha zas mi za'i kha zas rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'byor pa nyid du shes te/ lus tshim par 'gyuraro//
292a4: lus gzugs tshim par 'gyur ro// de dag yang lus la 'jug par mi byed do// de dag lus tshim nas spos kyi rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i lha'i spos kyi rnam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi nga thams cad bdugs par 'gyur ro// de na gang dri de la
292a5: sdom par mi 'dod pa de la spos dri'i 'du shes dang / bsgos pa tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar gang dag spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan
292a6: rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa de dag gi rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab par 'gyur ro// de dag gos kha dog tha dad / kha dog brgya stong du ma ci 'dra ba 'dod pa de lta bu'i gos rin po che
292a7: dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dethams cad yongs su khyab par 'gyur zhing / lus la bgos par bdag nyid kyis shes so// de dag 'di lta ste/ mgo'i rgyan nam/ rna ba'i rgyan nam/ mgul ba dang / lag pa dang /
292a8: rkang pa'i rgyan 'di lta ste/ cod pan dang / rnga cha dang / gdub bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / do shal dang / se mdo dang rna rgyan dang / sor dub dang / gser gyi tsong tsong dang / ske rags dang / gser gyi dra ba dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang /

292b1: rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rgyan ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyan rin po che brgya stong du mas spras pa dag 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa la 'phyang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang bar mthong
292b2: ste/ rgyan de dag gis bdag brgyan par yang shes so// de dag gang kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng gi bar dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi bgam brgya snying gis brgyan pa rin po che'i khri lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs
292b3: bting ba/ sngas khra bo bzhag pa dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang jis bu 'dod pa de la bu'i gzhal med pangar de dag/ de dag gi mdun du 'byung ste/ de dgarin po che'i gzhal med pang grub pa de dag gi nang na/ lha'i bu mo bdun stong bdun stong gis
292b4: yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'khod de/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang mi rnams tha dad pa med de/ gzhan du na kun rdzob kyi tha snyad kyis lha dang mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ni
292b5: ma gtogs so/ / kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mdun na mi ma rabs dang / mi tha ma ni lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin zhing mi 'jigs pa ma yin la 'od gsalab ma yin/
292b6: no// de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha rnams kyi mdun na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang 'di lta ste/ bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / gos dang rgyan dang / dbang dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / dbang /
292b7: phyug gis lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin te/ chos mngon par rtogs pa dang / chos la yongs su spyod pa ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo de la gzhan 'phel dbang byed kyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar/ bde ba
292b8: can gyi 'di 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams blta bar bya'o/ / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na/ snga dro'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe/ phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khrugs shing kun 'khrugs pa'i rlung ldang ste/ de dag gis rim

293a1: po che'i shing ljon pa bkrab/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog du ma yod pa/ lha'i spos dri rab tu zhim pa/ sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa de dag bskyod/ kun tu bskyod/ bskul/ kun tu
293a2: bskul nas/ de dag las me tog rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong ba'i bsung can/ blta na sdug bdag rin po che'i sa chen po de la 'brul te/ me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu mi 'greng bdun srid rtsam du bkram par
293a3: 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bus la me tog 'grems mkhas pa zhig gis/ lag pa gnyigs bkram ste mnyam par bkod na shin tu bkra zhing blta na sdug go// de bzhin du me tog bsud dang kha dog tha dad pa dang ldan pa de dag gis
293a4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu mi 'greng bdun tsam du khyab par 'gyur ro/ / me tog gi rnam pa de dag ni 'jam pa ste/ dpe tsam dun gos ka tsa li ni de ltar reg na bde pa'o// de dag ni rkang pa 'jog pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur zhing
293a5: rkang pa 'deg pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis mtho bar 'gyur ro/ / snga dro'i dus 'das nas ni me tog de dag kyang ma lus par med par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / dag par 'gyur zhing me tog snga ma rnams kyis
293a6: brnyogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ / de nas yang phyogs bzhi kun nas rlung langs te/ gang sngon ma byung ba'i me tog sar pa dag mngon par 'thor ro// snga dro'i ji lta bar nyi me'i gung dang / byi dro'i dus kyi tshe dang / mtshan mo dang srong dang / nam gyi gung dang / thongs
293a7: kyang de bzhin no/ / spos dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i rlung de dag langs nas/ sems can de dag la reg na 'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin
293a8: gshegs pas bsnyad pa ma gtogs par/ me dang nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i gzugs dang / mun pa mun nag gi sing du gdags pa yod med do// nyin mo dang mtshan mor gdags pa yang yod med do// lha mi

293b1: yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes kyang yod med do/ / kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na/ dus dus su lha'i spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha'i me tog kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa dag dang / lha'i rin
293b2: bo che sna bdun dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char mngon par 'bab bo// lha'i bla re dag kyang 'dzin to// lha'i rin po che'i gdugs rnga ma'i bsil yab dang / bcas pa dag kyang rnam
293b3: mkha' la 'dzin to/ / wa'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag kyang sgrogs shing / lha'i bu mo dag kyang gar byed do// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad rgya
293b4: ngan las 'das kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na 'di lta ste ma nges pa dang / log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po gnyis rnam par gzhag pa 'am/ gdags pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo mdor
293b5: bsdu na nam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste/ rgyas par ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par bstan na ni/ bskal pa zad zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu rnams yongs su brjod kyang
293b6: bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs gyur la// dam pa'i don mkhas ye shes rnam dag ste/
293b7: de dag bskal pa 'am 'on te lhag par ni// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa rab brjod kyang // bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba rab tu brjod pa na// bskal pa bye ba de dag zad 'gyur gyi// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa mthar mi phyin// de dag sngon
293b8: pa 'ang zad par 'gyur ba yin/ / gang gis phra rab rdul snyed 'jig rten khams// bshig cing btags te rdul du byas gyur pa// de bas mang ba'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pas ni/ gang gis dpag

294a1: tu med pa'i 'od mtshan dang / / bde ba can gyi yon tan byang 'phags rnams// thos nas dga' ste thal mo sbyor byed pa// bsod nams 'di yi char yang 'gyur ma yin// de lta bas na de bzhin
294a2: gshegs pa de'i/ / yon tan thos nas dgu dang dad skyed la// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'gro bar bya phyir mos pa drag po skyed// gang gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi// ming thos pa yi bsod nams de la ni//
294a3: 'di mchog thagru chen po de dag kun// cha dang dper yang 'gyur ba ma yin no// gang dag rgyal ba'i bka' dang shes rab can// de dag de bas bsod nams mang du 'gyur// don dam thob phyir dad pa tsam pa ste// de lta bas na thos nas/
294a4: yid gnyis sol// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi yon tan dang // bsngags pa de ltar dpag tu med do// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu 'phyogs de re sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom
294a5: ldan 'das gang gA'i klung bye ma snyed dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan yongs su brjod do/ / bsngags pa gsung ngo // grags pa rab tu sgrogs so// yon tan brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
294a6: can gang dag kha ci kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang za na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig bsam pa thag pa nas/ dad pa dang dga' ba skyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
294a7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro/ / kun dga' bo sems can gang dag kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pas yang dang yang du yid la byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub tu sems
294a8: yongs su bsngos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de dge slong gi tshogs du mas yongs su smo/

294b1: cing / mdun gyis bltas nas bzhugs par 'gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de mthong nas/ rab tu dang pa'i sems kyis shi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro//
294b2: kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gis tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong yang ci ma rung snyam du sems dpa' des/ tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems
294b3: bskyed la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing derang skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems yang dag par btang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa bya zhing / yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// kun dga' bo gang dag yang de
294b4: bzhin gshegs pa de yang yid la byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa rgyun du bskyed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems yang dag par gtong ba de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
294b5: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa de'i ba dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng dang / zham ring ba dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dag mdun du gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag de
294b6: bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dad pa la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rjed pa med pa'i dran pas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sems can gang dag de bzhin
294b7: gshegs pa de tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam rjes su dran par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar yang 'dod la/ chos zab mo dag 'chang ba na dga' ba thob cing skyed lug pa med la mi 'god mi zhum zhing tha na sems bskyed pa
294b8: gcig tsam de bzhin gshegs po 'od dpag med de yid la byed de/ 'dod pa yang skyed na de dag rmi lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de mthong zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der bskye bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag

295a1: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa deng gdon gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dgag tu med pa dag na
295a2: bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan yid yongs su rjod/ bsngags pa yang gsung bstod pa yang sgrogs so// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/
295a3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su drib bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs
295a4: pa'i khyad par de dag blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi do 'di nyid rgyas par gsung zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal pa// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la// phyag
295a5: bya'i phyir ni shar gyi sangs rgyas zhing / / mtha' yas gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag me tog kha dog tha dad pa// dri zhim yid 'od mang po snyam thogs te// tshe dpag
295a6: med pa lha dang mis mchod pa/ / mimi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor/ 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la// phyag bya'i phyir ni de bzhin ljon pa dang // byang phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams di snyed nas// rdzogs
295a7: papa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags/ / de dag spos kyi kha dog tha dad pa// dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te// tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa// mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// byang chub sems
295a8: dpa' mang po de dag gis/ / mchod pa byam de dpag med pod zhabs la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ru// sangs rgyas zhing ni ngo mtshar mdes shes 'dzer// dag zhing mgu ba'i sems ni gzhal yas kyis// de dag gis ni ma

295b1: tog snying gtor nas/ / 'dren par sa sun sngang 'di skad du// bdag cag zhing yang 'di 'drar gyur ces smras// de dgas tog snyim pa gtor ma lnga// de cod gnad tuba'i gdugs cu ste// gegs par brgyan cing yub bzab
295b2: mas rgyab phral kun tu sa pags/ / byang chub sems da da na // bsnyen pa cwa bya sa dag 'gas/ mgasacanas pa/ sem can da sa gas
295b3: bas r+b+bas zhing 'di na / cag sngags pas na// bdag gagazhan po da legs pa rnye// bzhal brjod na ga grugs pa// maM lamAs pa'i na ci nga stes// 'odon ga da ga
295b4: sa dge 'an gime pa/ / byung nu mas pa/ sa baspyod kyi mdzes byung bya// sas rgyas pasodananas su po ma chogs s+ho/ ga med kyis dus mnanas// 'od kyi byed thag cig dun drum/
295b5: gnas cad kyil 'khor na byu ste// ni sto bye ba dag ni khyab par mas// 'bre dag thams cad snga log ste// 'dren pa'i smigadug de ni pa par gyur// de tshe 'od gro par gyur nas ni// ska dang mi rnams
295b6: gas pa snyed/ ga // smra / byu / ga na sa 'dum ma da da na /
295b7: ma gas pa can// dod dmamapa pa ni lu bstan gsol// gsung mchog da 'i tho nas/ mams can da ni ga pa'i sems su gyur// jig rten pasas ma nga chu ma pas/ @
295b8: ba/ slad bde ba can 'di mchig// de dag thos nas dga' ba cher baspyad de// rlung duzhing 'dirnam par smra bar 'gyur// rgya chen zhi pa der sngags par gyur nas kyang // lhami mig dang phyi na pa dang // tshe rabs dran dpa

296a1: thos mkhas mchog dang / / rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang sbyang du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis lung bstan pa// ngas ni sngon tshe smon lam 'di skad btab// sems can dag gis nga yi med thos na
296a2: ngayi zhing du rtag tu 'ong bar shog/ nga yi smon lam bzang po rdzogs pas// 'jig rten khams mang dag nas sems can 'od// de dag nga yi zhing du lhags nas ni// de dag skye ba gcig las phyir mi ldog/ de'i phyir bya
296a3: chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dir/ / bdag gi zhing yang 'di 'drar 'gyur ba dang // bdag gis ming dang sgra dang lta bas kyang // sems can mang po dgrol bar bya 'dod pa// de ni myur du rings par la gor du//
296a4: bcan gyi 'jig rten 'alas song la// 'od dpag med kyi gan du son nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba stong la mchod bgyis// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis zhing mang song nas ni// sangs rgyas byi ba mang la mchod byas te// bde
296a5: ba gshegs la mchod pa byas nas kyang / / dro lar bde bcan du slar yang 'ong // / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// kun dga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
296a6: rgyas 'od dpag med de'i byang chub kyi shing ni 'phang du dpag tshad stong drug brgya yod pa/ yal ga dang lo mo dang / yadab ma dpag tshad brgyang baHtshun chad du 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i sboms dang / khrun dpag tshad lnga bAH
296a7: yod par rtag tu lo mchags pa/ rtag tu me tog chags pa/ rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog paHstong du ma yod pa/ lom tha dad pa/ me tog tha dad pa/ 'bras bub dngang/ rgyan sna tshogs
296a8: kyis brgyan pa/ zla ba lta bur snang ba'i nor bu rin pa ches yongs su gsal ba/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches rnam par spras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po tshom gang ba/ rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che mchog

296b1: gis shin du rnam par spras pa/ kha dog lha'i las 'das pa/ gser gyi skud pa 'phyang ba/ se me do mdzes pa dang / rin po che'i chun po dang / rgyan 'phreng dang do shal tshig rkyang dang / mu tig dmar po'i rgyun 'phreng dang /
296b2: mu tig sngon po'i rgyan 'phreng dang / seng ge'i ban 'phyang ba'i ska rags kyi tshogs yod pa/ rin po che'i skud pa dang / rin pa che thams cad dang / dung gis mngon par smras pa/ gser gyi dra ba dang / mu tig gi dra bad
296b3: rin po chathams cad kyi dra ba dang / dril bu'i g.yer ka'i dra bas tha rer shes pa/ chu shrIn dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang / thA ga ma la bras legs par brtan pa/ nor bu 'khrol ba dang / gtse
296b4: dang / rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par brgyan pa'o// kun dga' bo byang chub kyi shing de ni rlung gis bskyod par sgra dbyangs 'byung ba gang yin pa des
296b5: 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pago bar byed do/ / kun dga' bo de la byang chub kyi shing gi sgra de sems can gang dag gi rnamam du grag pa de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du na nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// sems can
296b6: dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyi me khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med tshad med/ brjod du med pa gang dag gi mig lam du byang chub kyi shing de snang ba de dag gi byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du mi gnad kyis mi btab par shes
296b7: par bya'o/ / kun dga' ba sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i dri tsher ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang stand kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o// sems can gzhas byang chub kyi shing de 'bras bu
296b8: myong ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lce nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o/ / byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sems can gang dag la khyab par gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lus la nad kyis

297a1: mi btab par shes par bya'o/ / kun dga' bo sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de chos nyid du nges par sems pa de dag kyang de na cu ste/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sems mi g.yeng bar shes
297a2: par bya'o/ / sems can de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi shing de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon
297a3: lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang / spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa dang / shin tu bsgoms pa dang / me nyung ba dang / ma tshang ba med pas/ 'di lta ste/ sgra'i rjes
297a4: su 'gro ba dang / rjes su 'thun pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / bzod pa rnam pa gsum 'thob bo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar
297a5: 'gyur ba de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs par gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ smon lam gyi dbang ni ma gtogs so// byang chub sems
297a6: dpa' de dag ni seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba la brtson pa sha stag go// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos gang dag 'khod pa de
297a7: dag ni 'od 'dom gang ba sha stag go/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od dpag tshad dbye ba brgya stong pa sha stu ga ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
297a8: bor yug tu snang bas khyab par byed pa de gnyis ni ma gtogs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

297b1: gnas kya nga gas pa/ / bcom pan 'das sa bka'astsal pa// kun dag sa gtam sa gcagag pa byung chubyasasas dpa' sems da chen pa stan ras gsags dbang ma ts+tsha/
297b2: ma nim chen tha ba ces byaste/ kun ga ba ga nyis ni sa sa N+Din dzin pa ga'o sa nas sa sa cas pa / lo// kun dga' ba byung chubs mas dpa gang dan sangs rgyas kyi 'ang gas pa da
297b3: cad ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan bum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa lus yangs su rdzogs pa/ bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa la ma'as pa/ shes rabakyis rab tu ba la mkhas pa/ dbang ba buM/ dbang po bcwa
297b4: kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa/ ma zhum pa/ dbang po mi g.yo ba/ bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan mtha' bas pa mu med pa sha stag go/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de
297b5: dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mi 'bral ba/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du log par mi ltung ba'i chos can sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad 'di nas nye bar bzud nas/ nam yang tshe rabs mi dran par mi 'gyur
297b6: tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ gang dag dper na da ltar gyi de bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus na gang gi tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bskal pas zugs pa dag dugs
297b7: par sngon smon lam btab pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad snga dro gcig bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu dong nas/
297b8: sang brgyas mom ldan 'das bye ba khrag cigi phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byed de/ de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang gdugs dang / rgyal

298a1: mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag gis mchod pa bya'o// snyam du ji lta ji ltar sems bskyed cing / ji ltar 'dod pa rnams de dag gis sems bskyed ma
298a2: thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad lag pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis me tog nas rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sa
298a3: mchod pa byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po tshad med grangs med pa dag kyang skyed cing stsogs so// gal te me tog gi skon bu rnam pa 'di lta bu lag ba nas stsu bar gyur cig ces 'dod na yang / de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag
298a4: dulha'i me tog kha dog tha dad pa/ dri tha dad pa/ dri drir yod pa'i skon bu dag lag pa nas 'byung ste/ de dag gis skon bu'i me tog rnam pa de lta bu de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'bor/ mdon pa rgo pa rab tu 'grong
298a5: skon bu'i me tog gtor ba de dag thams cad las/ nang gi chung ngu gang yin pa de yang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam gyi me tog gi gdugs su 'gyur te/ phyi ma sho ma gtor gyi bar du snga ma sa la mi ltung ngo //
298a6: den skon bu'i me tog gtor ba gang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad nyi shu'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs su 'gyur ba yang yod// dpag tshad sum cu dang / bzhi bcu'i ched tsam yang yod// steng gi bar snang la me tog gi gdugs
298a7: dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad kyi bar tsam du 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ / de na gang dag dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyed cing / sems dga' ba rgya chen po thob nas dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med/ dpag tu med
298a8: pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ snga dro gcig la slar log nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gnas so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med

298b1: de'i sngon gyi smod lam gyi byin rlabs kyis yongs su zin pa dang / sngon chos mnyan pa byed pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi smor lam 'byor cing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi ltung ba dang /
298b2: shin tu rnam par bye ba dang / shin tu bsgoms pas sman lam btab pa 'grub bo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
298b3: dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba dag go/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can ga dag yos su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga' yang mi spyad de/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhi zhe kun tu 'chag cing / rnam par grub na
298b4: dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba mi skyed do// 'gro ba na yang ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gro'i ltos pa dang bcas par ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gnas kyi sems dang / sems de lta bu dag
298b5: layang yod med do/ / kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa de dag la/ gzhan gyi 'du shes med/ rang gi 'du shes med/ bdag gi 'du shes med/ 'thab pa med/
298b6: rtsod pa med/ mi 'thun pa med/ mi mnyam pa'i sems med de/ de dag ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i
298b7: sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / rab tu dang ba'i sems dang / brtan pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / brnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
298b8: byiphyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa'i sems dang / sems kyi rgyud sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la blo rab tu zhugs pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho'i chen po dang mnyam pa/ blo ri rab dang mtshungs pa/ yon tan du ma bsags pa/ byang chub kyi yan

299a1: lag yang dag par 'gro bas rnam par rtsen pa/ sangs rgyas yang dag par 'gro ba la mngon par brtson pa/ shi'i mig rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa/ shes rab kyi mig
299a2: rtogs par khong du chud pa/ chos kyi mig gi pha rol tu son pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrub cing 'chad de ston pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa/ khams sum mnyam
299a3: pa nyid du mngon par brtson pa/ sems dul ba/ sems zhi ba/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa/ kun 'byung ba'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa/ chos kyi nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ gsal ba dang / migs
299a4: bal mkhas pa/ tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa'i gtam la mi lta bar gnas pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam rnams kyis snying po rtogs pa/ chos thams cad yongs su
299a5: tshol ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes pas gnas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul ba ci yang med pa/ len pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ phung po med pa/ len pa med pas
299a6: shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams la thug pa med par gnas pa/ rtsa ba med pa la gnas pa/ sems chags pa med pa/ zhum pa med pa/ chos zab mo rnams la
299a7: mngon par brtson pa/ sgyid lug pa med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs par dka' ba la 'jug pas/ 'phags pa/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam rjes su thob pa/ the tsom med pa/ dogs pa las rgal ba/ shes
299a8: pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa/ ye shes kyis mngon par 'phags te/ ri rab dang mtshungs pa/ 'khrugs pa med pa'i blos rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba/ shes rab kyi 'od dang dkar zhing shin

299b1: tu dkar la/ dag cing dge ba'i sems dang / gser btso ma'i kha dog 'dra bar snang zhing 'od 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi mchog gisanyezla'i 'od las shin tu 'das pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang pa dang /
299b2: mi dge ba'i bzod pas sa dang mtshungs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru bar 'bab pas chu dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la rlom sems su byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i phyir me'i rgyal po dang mtshungs pa/
299b3: 'jig rten thams cad la mi chags pa'i phyir/ rlung dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad nges par phigs pa dang / thams cad du ci yang med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa'i
299b4: phyir/ pad ma dang 'dra ba/ chos dang chos ma yin par mngon par sgrogs pas/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'brug chen po dang mtshungs pa/ chos kyi chu'i char mngon par 'bebs pas char pa chen po dang 'dra ba
299b5: tshogs chen po zil gyis gnon pas khyu mchog dang mtshungs pa/ sems shin tu mchog du dul bas glang po chen po dang 'dra ba/ shin tu dul bas rta cang shes bzang po dang mtshungs pa/ rtsal dang mi 'jigs
299b6: pas skrag pa med pa'i phyir/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad nga yongs su skyob pas/ shing gi rgyal po n+ya gro da dang mtshungs pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi g.yos
299b7: pas de'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'drab/ byams pa tshad med pa bsgoms pas/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dbang dbya ba'i sngon du 'gro bas tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ gnas
299b8: su stsogs pa med pas bya dang mtshungs pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pas/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding dang 'dra bas/ 'byung bar dka' ba'i phyir/ u dum bar ra'i me tog dang

300a1: mtshungs pa/ nga ba sa skar shin du mnyam par bzhag papa/ rnam par g.yeng ba med pa/ dbang parmugs pa med pa/ rnam par gtan la 'babs pa la mkhas pa/ bzad pa dang nges pa mang ga
300a2: rol phun sum tshogs par smon pas/ phrag dog med pa/ chos kyi gtam rnams la 'jigs pa med pa/ chos yongs su tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba/ tshul khrims kyis bai dUr+ya dang 'dra ba/ thos pas rin po
300a3: che'i 'byung gnas dang mtshungs pa/ chos kyi rnga sgra chen pos sgra snyan pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po rdung pa/ chos kyi dung chen po 'bud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po sgreng ba/ chos kyi ba dan chen po 'dzin pa/ chos
300a4: kyi sgron ma chen po rab tu 'dra bar byed pa/ shes rab kyis rnam par lta ba/ rmongs pa med pa/ zhe sdang med pa/ za ba btul ba/ dag pa/ dring ba med pa/ brkam pa med pa/ yang dag par 'gyed pa la dga'
300a5: ba gtong ba btang ba/ sbyin pa la lag brkyang ba/ chos dang zang zing yang dag par byed pa la dga' ba/ sbyin pa la ser sna med pa/ 'dres pa med pa/ yid 'jigs pa med pa/ chags pa med pa brtan
300a6: pa dpa' ba/ gces pa 'dzin pa/ mos pa dang ldan pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa/ zug rngu byung ba/ gtan pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa nges pa/ 'grog na de ba/ don byed pa/ 'jig rten
300a7: gsal ba med pa/ 'dren pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spangs pa/ dag pa/ mya ngan dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma gsum spangs pa/ mngon par shes pas
300a8: rnam par can pa/ rlu stabs can/ smon lam gyi stobs can/ mi dman pa/ mya gyu med pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig pa rgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dargyal gyi zug du gonapa/

300b1: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / bral ba dag pa/ dag ba lams pa/ rgyal ba dam pas bsngags pa/ 'jig rten la mthas pa/ sbyangs pa' ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ rgyal bas
300b2: bstod pa/ sems dga' ba dang ldan pa/ rtul 'phod pa/ sran thub pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ zab med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ rdul med pa/ 'dus pa/ rgya che ba/ khyu mchog tu gyur pa/ bden pa smra ba/ blo da
300b3: ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi mtshon cha'i lag cha can/ bsod nams dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ za ba dang dri ma dang / khong khro ba dang / bral ba/
300b4: chos la rtag tu brtson pa/ chos thams cad la thos pa rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa sha stag go/ kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu sha stag ste/ rgyas
300b5: par byan gal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas pas bstan kyang / skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' bstan par mi nus la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
300b6: 'jigs pa yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi spobs pa bla na med pa de gnyis
300b7: ka yang bsam gyis mi khyab cing / mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo longs la nub phyogs su phyogs te/ me tog gtor la/ thal mo sbyor te/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
300b8: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rdul med cing rnam par dag pa bzhugs shing / 'tshe la gzhes shing chos gang ston pa'i phyogs der phyag 'tshol cig/ de'i mtshan de yang sgrib pa med par phyogs

301a1: bcur grags te/ phyags ririn yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsung chags pa sa mang pa ning gsung zags pa mi mnga' bgad+hA ba klung gi byam skad dag lan 'ga' ma yin par/ bsngags pa/
301a2: brjod cing bstod de sman par gsung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad cis gsopa do// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa
301a3: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ang dpag tu med pa de dang tshed pag du med pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya gang mang po la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskur
301a4: pa de dag la lta 'tshal lo/ / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di smras mthag tu de nas de'i mdo las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i phyag gi mthil nas/ 'od gdags/
301a5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong snang bas khyab par 'gyur de lta bu'i 'od byeng ngo // de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong thams cad na ri nag po 'am/ rin po che'i ri'am/ lhun po'am/ lhun po chen po 'am/
301a6: ba dang zung 'am/ ba dang zung chen po 'am/ khor yug gam/ khor yug chen po 'am/ brtsigs pa 'am ka ba 'am/ shing ljon pa stug po 'am/ bskyed mos tshal lam/ gzhal med khang ngam/ lha dang maM
301a7: gang su dag yod pa de dag thams cad las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis thal bar gyur cing zil gyis non par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar nas mi zhig 'dom gang tsam na 'dug pa la
301a8: mi zhig lta ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang 'od de yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dag bsnyen ma dag dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /

301b1: dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lte ze chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
301b2: sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ri'i rgyal por rab ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags te/ phyogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ lham ma lhan ne/ lhang dang mdzes pa de dang / byang chub sem
301b3: dpa'i tshitshogs chen po de dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun de la lha'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po 'di chu gcig tu gyur na/ de la shing ljon pa rnams med/ ri rnams med/ gling rnams med/ nA dang shing gal
301b4: ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnams med/ chu klung rnams med cing / dam grog dang / g.yang sa rnams mi snang ste/ gzhan du na sa chen pa rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa ni ma gtogs so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas
301b5: kyi zhing de na nyan thos rnams kyi lus las mngon par grub pa'i 'od 'dom gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'od dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong yod pa ma gtogs par gzhan rtags sam/ mtshan ma chung
301b6: zad kyang med do/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med des nyan thos kyi tshogs de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de zil gyis mnan
301b7: nas/ phyogs thams cad du gsal bar kun tu snang ngo // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang me de thams cad dang / 'dig rten gyi thams mi
301b8: mad 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shA kyi thub pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pos bskor cing chos ston pa yang snang ngo // de rna bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me pam/

302a1: pa la bka' stsal pa// mi 'pham pa khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang / steng gi bar snang la kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' bdag dang / nags
302a2: tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang / bskyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang / chu klung dang / rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dag dang / rin po che'i me tog pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos gang ba dag dang /
302a3: 'og tu sa'i steng nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi nam mkha'i ngos la me tog bkram pa dang / me tog gi 'phreng bas kun tu mdzes par byas pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs bkra ba'i phreng gis gang ba dang /
302a4: de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i bya sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyis bstan pa mthong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi 'pham pa khyod kyis 'di
302a5: las gzhan pa'i bya'i tshogs/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad skas go bar byed cing / des byang chub sems dpa' de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba dag mthong ngam/
302a6: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ milam brjod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can 'di dag gzhal med khang dpag tshad brgya stong yod pa dag tu zhugs te/ bar snang
302a7: la chags pa med par 'gro ba de dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzhan phul dbang byed kyi lha
302a8: rabs dang / 'jig tan gyi khams bde ba can du skyes pa'i mi rnams tha dad du bya ba yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni tha dad du bgyi ba gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste// 'jig rten

302b1: gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bar du lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can den mi kha cig/ pad ma chen
302b2: dag gi mngal na gnas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral gyi lha rnams/ gzhal med khang dpag tshad lnga bcu pa 'am/ dpag tshad brgyal
302b3: pa 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa rnams su zhugs te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das da gis ji rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi kha cig pad ma chen po dag gi mdal na gnas par/
302b4: mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das de na sems can rdzus te 'byung ba gang dag pad ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas te/ 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kha cig pad ma'i mngal na gnas pa dang /
302b5: kha cig pad ma la skyil mo krung bcas nas/ rdzus te 'byung ba de'i rgyu ni gang lags// rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas
302b6: kyi zhing gzhan dag na gnas te the tsom du ltung ba'i sems kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa de dag ni de na mngal na gnas so// gang dag the tsom med cing /
302b7: som nyi med de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la yid ches shing dad la mos
302b8: pa de dag ni pad ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung ngo / / mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa gang dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

303a1: ma ldan 'dug dang / /
303a2: med pa la som nyi med cing / rang gi dge pa'i rtsa ba yang sngags pa de dag ni rgyal me kyang banas nas/ rdzas te 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'das na// byang chub sems dpa' rgyas nas rang sa ma na shAg+sa/
303a3: dga'adra bar lung sa kyis lus la rnam pa dag bung 'gyur ro// mi pam pa shes rab gyi kyad par dang / shes rab kyi rim pa dang / 'di na com du snang pa'i 'ang shes yod ma byed pas/ 'dis la
303a4: bad+hA sangs rgyas pyod pa las yoms mas shing / byung chubasems dpa yong ba dang / na pa dang / sa kyig sa dang / rgyu ba dang / bang bla gas pam cad
303a5: yongs su nyams pa'i shes rab yongs su nyams pa dang / shes rab chung pal ltos/ mi pham pa 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bos nas dbang bsrung ba la khro mon gser dang / bedUr+ya thams
303a6: cad kyis spras pa/ dar dang 'phreng ba dang / lda ldi'i tshogs sbyangs pa/ tshon sna tshogs kyi bla re bres pa/ ras bcos bu bting ba/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/ bdug pa rgya chen pos bdugs pa
303a7: khang bzangs dang bsil khang dang / skar khung dang / kha khyer dang rta babs dang / bkam rin pa che sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gser dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yeng ka'i dras bres pa/ gru bzhi lhas pa/ ka
303a8: bzhi zug pa/ sgo bzhi btong pa/ them skas bzhi pa zhig yod pa/ rgyal po de'i bu nyes bzhig gi phyir/ khri mon der bcug ste/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi khang sgril du bcug la/ der de'i khri bshams te/

303b1: stan go ni ka bting pal par tshangs can dang / ba la lig bting ste/ yul ka ling ka'i ras kyi gding ba bting la/ de'i steng du dang ba ting ste// g.yas g.yos gnyis su rten ma dmar po bzhag la/ bkrab bltan sdug
303b2: bde la de 'dug kyang rung / nyal yang rung / de'i zas skom gtsang ma gsod pa rnam pa mang po du ma pashams na/ mi pham pa 'dir sbrum du sems/ rgal po'i bu de'i yongs su spyod pa rgya che ba yin nas/
303b3: pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgya che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi 'pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ des de'i ro myang bar byed dam/ ming par byed dam/ des dga' ba thob pam/ gsol pa/
303b4: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags ste/ nongs pa gang gi slad du/ rgyal pos khri mon der stsal pa de las thar par 'tshal zhing / rigs bzang po rigs bzang po'i gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor
303b5: dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / khams kyi rgyal po'am/ gang gis khri mon de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba yongasu tshol te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu de btson ra de na dga' ba ma mchis shing /
303b6: rgyal pos ma gnang gi bar du mi thar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi 'pham pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag the tsom du ltung bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brgyad cing sangs rgyas kyi ye
303b7: shes me mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i ye shes la som nyi za ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa de dang / sems dang pa tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skye ba yang pad ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas
303b8: shing rdzas te 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ pad ma rnams kyi mngalan gnas pa myong ste/ de dag de la bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang du 'du shes shing gnas te/ bsha gce med/ mchil med snabs med

304a1: yid dang mi 'thun pa mi 'byung med kyi/ lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthang ba dang / 'bal ba 'chas kyakyigatam rnam par nges pa dang / dag pa'i chos spyad pa
304a2: thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de dag de na mngon par mi dga' zhing mgu ba mi 'thob kyi/ sngon gyi nyes pa zad nas de dag pad ma'i mngal rnams nas 'byung ste/ de dag de nas byung yang stengang 'am/ 'og gam thad kar byung/
304a3: ba mi shes so// mi pham pa 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po grangs med/ tshad med dpag tu med pa dag bskyed par bya ba dang / sangs
304a4: rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba de thams cad kyang the tsom za ba'i nyes pas bsgrubs par ma gyur pa la ltos/ / mi pham pa the tsom gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa chen po ji tsam
304a5: du 'gyur ba la ltos/ / mi 'pham pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis the tsom yongs su spangs te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ myur du sems can thams cad la/ phan pa dang / bde ba'i stobs
304a6: bskyed pa'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pazhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i
304a7: phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
304a8: kyi zhing 'di nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas nas ji snyed cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar

304b1: 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bded
304b2: can du skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pas/ phyir mi ldog par yongs su 'grub na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas chung ngu rnams la smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin
304b3: gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ de bzhin
304b4: gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa skar mI 'ong
304b5: kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
304b6: nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi smon ma'i gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
304b7: bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa klu zil gyis gnon pa'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdul
304b8: bral 'od kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong 'jig

305a1: garten gyi khams pa de ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dang la brtags kya gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrag phrag brgyad na rtsagacag 'dag/ na bya thams padab can du sgrub chung
305a2: ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po'i gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mngon par shes pa'i ga
305a3: nas/ byang chub sems dpa nye khri nyis stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyal mtshon gyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'thob pa// 'jug
305a4: pa gcig gis yang dag par zhugs pa/ nyi ma brgyad pa gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i 'khor ba bsnyil pa/ bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar
305a5: 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i bdag po'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa'i
305a6: gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su dri bar bya ba'i phyir/
305a7: 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan du skye par 'gyur ro// mi pham pa rnam grangs de lta byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gis gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams pade bcan du// de bzhin
305a8: gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshang bar brjod kyang / mtha' rtogs par mi nus so//

305b1: mi pham pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i sems can de dag dad pa ji snyed cag legs par rnyed pa la ltos// sems can gang
305b2: dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la/ tha na sems dad pa gcig tsam rnyed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dad pa mi phyed pa de dag ni dman pa la mos par mi 'gyur ro// mi pham pa de lta bas na khyod
305b3: mos par bya/ khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du chos kyi rnam grangasa'i
305b4: gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// mi pham pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
305b5: nyid zhag gcig tsam yang bzung zhing bcangs te klags shing kun chub par byas la/ bsam pa thag pa nas gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag yang bshad par bya'o// tha na glegs bam la legs par bris te/ bcang
305b6: bar bya zhing de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang bskyed par bya'o/ / gang zhig sems can dpag tu med pa dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la dgod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
305b7: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de la bsgo ba dang / bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa des/ chos kyi rnam
305b8: grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba las zhal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o// thos nas kyang g.yor mi ltung ba'i rgyud kyis bas

306a1: rnas sa / sa canam sangs 'di ga'ang da na rngu par dang / sa nga/ dang /
306a2: yo chen pa brtsal par bya'o// bar pa gcig brjod pa srid du yang gzhan dgas yang brjod par bya'o// stong dgus pa gyi stong can pa'i 'jigan kyilams thos yongs sa gang ba rnam dus kyang /
306a3: dang ldan pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zheran/ mi phal pa 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba thag khrig phrag du ba dag/ chos kyi bras rgya pon pa 'di lta bu 'di nyad gyi/
306a4: tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na// dpapa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i bar du chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu sangs
306a5: rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gtong pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po myur tu sgrub pa 'di gang
306a6: dag gis rna lam du grag pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa shin tu legs par rnyed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin
306a7: rnam kyi byi brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang
306a8: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab du ston pa dang / bsgom pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / tha na yi ger bris te/ mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/

306b1: de bzang bar sgru ba pa yin no// sa pas pa/ gangan das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de byas pa mad/ khyed kyang rnam pa med par brtsod par byaman// sangs rgyas kyi
306b2: shes chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la so ma nyi ma za shig/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ringan po che'i brtson rang chu dang de/ mi pham pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka//
306b3: chos bstan pa rnyed par dka' 'o// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka' 'o// mi pham pa des khyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsnyad kyis da khyed kyis mngon
306b4: par sbyor la bsgrubs shig/ mi 'pham pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad pa chen po bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par
306b5: gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ma 'khrugs par gyis shig/ yun rin por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / log par
306b6: ltung bar gyur ta re/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams dag ni ma byas pa// 'di 'dra 'di dag thos mi 'gyur//
306b7: dpa' bo gang dag thub gyur pa// de dag gsung 'di thos par 'gyur// gang gis 'od mdzad 'jig rten mgon// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas ni// gus dang bcas
306b8: pas chos thos pa/ / de dag dga' ba dam pa 'thob// lta ba can dang dman dang zhu ma rnams kyis// sangs rgyas chos la dang ba rnyed mi nus// gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mchod

307a1: ma da pa zag/ / zla m+b+ha/ gas sa / sa sa d+hA/
307a2: sa gas sa / sang sa nas / na ga /
307a3: ra gas na// sa rgyam ma / sums pagams ga ga hU~M/
307a4: bskal pa'amangon te lhag par ni// sangs rgyas gcig gi sa / na brjod byed kyang // de dag ba myang na 'das 'gyur ste/ bskul pa ba yang rjid kyang /
307a5: sma sa rgyas gas ma / // de sa sa g+sa pa'i na / ga pa 'din / rgyal
307a6: ye shes phung po dbang byas te/ / sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen ces tshig tu bskyod// brgyal man ni me yi lus rnyed la// brgyal ma na ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar
307a7: da dang shes rab kun ring rnyed par 'gyur/ de bas don thob bya phyir brtson 'grus sted// gang zhig chos mchog 'di 'dra thos nas ni// bde ga shegs da pa dag
307a8: thob par 'gyur/ / gang shig sangs rgyas byang chub mes byed pa/ dedage 'das pa'i dus da nga dang bshes/ sa sa thangs 'ad sha pa// sem hra

307b1: gnyis chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dgag/ bya ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhes ni bya ma 'ad pa'i 'bras bu zab po// dge slong brgyad ba sku'i ni lan pa mang pas
307b2: zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa ldan mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha dang mi'i skye dgu bye ba khrag khrig brgya sto bub phrag
307b3: bzhi bcu ni sngon ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed nas/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang / phyag bya
307b4: ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bde ba can du skye bar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sngo bar byed do// de dag thams cad der skyes nas kyang / mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i
307b5: spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs shes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
307b6: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mar ma mdzad las bzod pa thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig
307b7: phrag brgyad cu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang / 'jig
307b8: 'arten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te/ sngon gyi smon lam dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa

308a1: d+hAg pas/ / ma pa ma pa zugs / gas sa la bras la gas pa / sma ma kyims rnams
308a2: g+sanags pa ra/ 'o myigs pang du yang des skul gas ca grags par drug/ sem ma kyis de ces bka' stsal nas/ byang gAb sems das
308a3: sems das can pa mam padang / can pasben dag sa/ nga ldan pa dus/ gdang medang / lham yinang/ drib sarnas pa'i dag rten med sa
308a4: mas kyis gzungs pas mdzin par da / 'bags pa sa ga na gsu chen pa chos ma sa d+hA / na gagags pa da
308a5: sa rgya tsun na da pa zhes / 'dul pa bdags so// pan kri rgyal mtshan gyis bgyur ci sa/ dge/
